If start heating so fast and you see the tv with a lot of dots it means that is defective. I thought that it was the tv and i bought a new tv, silly of me, hahahaha. Be careful

I bought a firestick first and hated it. I had so many issues with it day 1. I have had NO issues with this Roku. It's actually the 3rd Roku device in my home. My ONLY issue with Roku is I hate the quick app buttons on the remotes. If they are going to be there, you should be able to assign them at least.

With a DirectV monthly bill approaching 200 a month and not getting much for our money, we tried a Roku, subscribed to Hulu for live local broadcasts, and gave a month to see how it works. We’re very pleased, installed additional Roku in the other rooms. Good bye DirectV. Our monthly bill for television has decreased by over 100 a month.

A friend has one of these and some of the models do not have a way to disable the stupid "high contrast" look that so many fools think it great.  Some of the Roku units have it and some do not.  Wasn't going to mess with it.  So, we just put the spare game console in that room and are using it.  Full HD and 4k.  DONE.

This works great! We never had cable and the antena only got a few stations, none of which were PBS. We missed PBS and this is the brand they offer to station members. It works great, is super easy to sue and has a great selection of stations. Glad I went with this. Now I should become a Passport member to get moready PBS content.

everytime i plug in to power have to reset my user so i just use manual mode  you would think paying  this kind of money it would save your info with battery back up in rom  on the plus side the units changes power to increase harder peddling very smooth  not good to leave these type products plug in all the time  FIRE DANGER

love this Roku tv channel thing . got it for my big tv in my office , needed a new laptop for streaming my movies and shows . A friend told me about this . got it for 29.00 $ instead of 1000.00 on a new laptop . works great and so easy to use !!! and can watch the channels i pay for and a bunch of free ones !!!

I should have read the reviews before I bought! Roku Express 2019 has the WORST wifi connection ever!!! I put my 8 year old laptop right next to the Roku Express and did a speed test. Roku- 22mps , laptop 157mps. I even bought a wifi extender to plug in right next to the Roku. Useless, got it up to 32mps, but watched it degrade back down to 22mps after about a hour.  Have 3 Roku's one express, one Roku Premium, and a Roku stick. Only the stick gets 65mps + speeds, and that took me putting a separate wireless router in same room as the stick about 8ft away!!!  Watching SpectrumTV is a joke on all but the stick!! Errors all the time. Thought it was only SpectrumTV, bot nope, happens on other channels

I bought Roko for my TV to stream channels that I have already paid for. When trying to hook it up I entered the code that appeared on my tv screen during setup and it stated that I would have to pay $79.99 fee for use of their product. I called customer service and they said that they are charging a fee, and that this  fee came in to affect May of 2020. There is nothing on the package about a one time fee, nor is there anything in the Amazon description stating that there is an additional fee. as a matter of fact; everything states that there are no hidden fees.  I am not happy with the hidden fee and I don't plan on keeping the Roku, I will replace with a  Amazon firestick that runs for free.

I cut the cord on cable so needed 6 of these, installed quick and easy. Simple learning curve from cable to streaming, but all went perfect. Remote is OK, but wish I paid more attention when buying as this one is not programmable to the TV so volume and power need to use TV remote.

This streaming stick is one of the best ones out there. I use it all the time, and my friends love it too! It supports Netflix, Hulu, YouTube and now one of the newest streaming service Disney+.  It’s one of the best for the price and flexibility of the product. And I also love the different tiers of the roku stick and how if you want a better experience you can pay more for better features, or if you just want a simple streaming stick, theirs one out there for you too. This is one of the lower end sticks but is still great for viewing, this is better for Apple users than a android tv and chrome cast that are more centric for android devices, amazing overall!!!

Bought this for an older TV without smart features. Hooked up the Roku, synced with our account, and waited for the channels to install. Had to delete around a dozen channels that came pre-installed, but didn't have to add any because it brought over all the ones we were using on our other Roku TV and those logins.The strip that comes with the Roku isn't very sticky. Adhered to a flat surface on the side of the TV and fell off under its own weight within 24 hours, and I expect will no longer stick anymore. Device is so small it has to stick somewhere or it won't stay under its own weight.

I chose to purchase ROKU Express Streaming Media Player to support my wanting more options to view programs, stations etc. that are streamed without paying more for my money. I also wanted to own this unit; avoiding monthly payments.  I am still getting used to this entertainment device and think it will take some time to form an opinion that expresses my use.

Product is ok.This vendor had a phone number come up when I was installing and I had to call a number and they said Roku changed their policy and I was on a free trial. They charged me 99.00 for life for more channels. Then another charge showed up on my credit card. My credit card company stopped the second charge. I called them, and they are rejecting both items. I have to wait for my new card now.

We love Roku to stream tv!  Bought one a few months ago for bedroom TV to replace an old Chromecast dongle (sorry Chromecast!!) and loved it. Got this Express Roku for familyroom. Paired with Hulu subscription, there is no need for cable ever.  Easy interface to navigate, mark favorites, see live sports (or watch from start if youre late to tune in), get cable channels, record to view later.  Enjoy!

IN LOVE WITH ROKU- I've now purchased 2 of these for my family. We love that we are able to watch any of the streaming services we want- Youtube, Netflix, Hulu, Disney plus- all available at the click of a button. Saves us monthly on our cable bill and allows us to have all our shows at your finger tips.
I set up this Roku, that I bought in January 2020, one night several months ago and can confirm that there is no activation fee.  I use this Roku just about every day.

I started out with a DVD player that had some streaming featured, but not that good. So most of my streaming was done on the Computer.I bought the Roku, and WOW what a difference. Streaming is fast. You get all the Big streaming networks and I don't have to switch from TV to computer and back, depending on what I want to watch.

I truly enjoy our rokus, from our smart tv to this base model. They all work great. So far... I haven't ran across an app for movies or tv they don't have. There are a ton of free apps out there. Plus, all the paid ones like Disney+ or xfinity. If you are looking for a station specific search call numbers. I'm starting to sound like an ad lol, but one last thing, I can't go back to tv without a roku.

This is my first time using it and I LOVE IT! It was so easy to set up. And on the manual it even says you don’t need to subscribe or pay a fee for roku. And I got it set up easily. And hulu works! I have tried many tv’s and devices for my tv to watch hulu and this one works! I love it!!! I recommend it! And I didn’t need to buy the more expensive one either. This one works so well!!

I'm a big fan of roku. I have a roku tv in my living room wanted a roku for the bedroom. I bought this and its perfect. Set up was easy took all of 5 minutes. Some things you should know: 1. You never actually have to point the remote at the box and it comes with an adhesive set up so you can stick it to the wall. 2. If something prompts you too pay, you're doing it wrong. You never have to pay for anything in roku unless of course you are subscribing to something. 3. You do not have to have a specific service (I.e. Netflix, Hulu, etc.) To use roku. You can use all free services. It's just a really great super user friendly streaming box.

I say its okay device because for 2020 and the device doesnt even have a volume adjuster on it. Its a big letdown. Who wants 2 remotes, one for volume, one for streaming? Thats why I give it 3 stars.Also another product feature that bugs me is that the volume  will go up and down between an app and the ads. Perhaps noone in Roku product team takes note of this . Maybe they should now after reading this review :)

I bought this product so that I could set up some streaming services on my mom's television, the set up was lengthy and annoying, rather than simply working directly out of the package. Then on top of that it would not allow me to complete set up without entering payment information. Since we already have the subscriptions to the streaming services, I saw no need to force the user to put their credit card information in this device as well. Threw it in the trash, most expensive pair of double A batteries I've ever bought.

I bought this to replace my Roku 2. I've been getting messages from Roku about how new features won't work on my Roku 2. I've also been having problems with the Roku 2 locking up and having to reboot.The first thing I noticed while setting up the Roku Express was that the remote has a key bounce problem. Key bounce? Really? I wrote my first debounce routine back in the 70's. I can send them the code if they don't know how.

It keeps shutting down and rebooting for no apparent reason. Seems to be worse on prime video app. I can't watch 10 minutes of a movie without it shutting down. Chrome cast did not have this problem on the same tv, same HDMI input. Nor do all of the other devices in the house. I may try another version and return this one.

I have not set up the new Express because they only included an 18 inch HDMI cable -- absurd.  Why include one at all if its that short - I would have to have a 20 inch set right next to the device to use - ridiculous.
I'm very happy with this. I don't pay for cable but I have prime, Netflix, and HBO and with this it was super easy to set everything up. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Got six TVs. Saves $7 to 10 a month for box rental from Xfinity. Has all the channels and options to watch recordings. Need to buy a couple more and send some cable boxes back. Bought a $16 Cudy wireless router for one that would sometimes lose signal with the door closed. Can't go wrong with these.

I have tried time and time again to connect it to my wifi and it keeps saying not connected, only connected one time. I have reset it, unplugged and restarted and still not able to connect. I have reset the modems and wifi and all other devices connect fine. The roku sits right next to wifi, so range is not the issue. I am outside of my return window and unable to get it to work.
Moved out of the Apartment, tired of Paying Cable so I cut the cableNow we are using Roku (along with selected services) and are spending one third as we were before, my viewing is on my terms.

I love Roku! I used to have the house filled with a certain other streaming device that constantly froze. But never had that issue with my Roku devices. I love the volume and power control on this remote as well. Definitely takes away the need for multiple remotes.

Love this once I got it to work. I bought two and the first one connected with no issues but the second one required me to access the hidden menu with a sequence of commands and change some settings in order to get it to work. Kinda frustrating but once it's going it is easy to use.
Great way to not pay double for premium channels at multiple locations. Very convenient to have all channels centralized.Annoying to have to authenticate every channel, but worth the effort.

Evidently my “smart” tv was rather dumb. My 2014 Samsung wouldn’t allow me to connect to STARZ or Disney+ or several other apps so the Roku was a great solution for the family.It weirdly occasionally flips on while watching my other tv service without touching the tuner but it’s fine.

Exactly as described, arrived on time, works well, good price. Setup: the first part was pretty fast and easy, getting the Roku to talk to the TV. The tedious part was entering passwords for amazon, netflix, hulu, etc, but once done all works and no problem. A very good solution and purchase, thanks.
I was very nervous to get this, I'm NOT very good with gadgets but found this much easier to use than the Firestick. Sorry Firestick.

Straight out of the box, this item didn't work properly.  There product support doesn't exist. It's all forums of people looking for answers and 1 out 50 may have had your particular problem.  The setup started off simple but it never completes. It updates over and over, non stop. And resetting doesn't work either.

Great product, I purchased this for my parents and it was real easy to setup. I saw some comments about a fee for activations. I asked around and was told that is false, Roku doesn't charge for activation.The remote is very basic, which makes it easy to use for everyone. There is a free app for Android and iOS that provides more features than the remote.

This device didn’t work well on my home network even though the signal strength was good, only 30 feet from my roster. It kept disconnecting and falling behind.  I moved it to a TV right next to my router and it was fine.  Clearly an issue with 2.4 GHz, so why not support 5G?

I love that that for just $25 I could turn my regular old TV into a smart TV and use all of my streaming services very quickly. I had a little issue getting the device connected to my WiFi but I solved that shortly after setting the Roku up. There’s great app support so you can easily control the device from your phone. My one complaint is that when using private listening mode, or using your phone and a connected headset to listen to the roku, the audio quality will drop slightly and sound a little too high pitched, but this is solved by pausing and resuming

I can’t remember a time ever seeing a remote without a power or volume button, had no idea the differences between the Roku models initially, but now I know. Terrible remote control. Why even build this? Spend the $5-10 extra to get the superior processing power and the superior remote.

Installed product and started process to activate on the tv. An alert said that there was netwok difficulty and to call a phone number. I did and the fake Roku representative said there was a $79 registration fee. Or $129 if I wanted to share with 4 devices. Fortunately I hung up and learned it was a hack into Roku! NY has a law suite against the 3 rd party company charging to allow an activation. Be careful

Got two of these this time, finally cut the cord. Got tired of Dish charging me $140 mth, when new customers pay 39.99, then it's a circus to get them to give me a discount for being loyal 10 yr customer and they think giving $40 discount month for 10 months is something......... Cut the cord.  Yes

Been getting emails from Roku and Hulu mentioned that my 10+ y.o. Roku models were incomaptible with Hulu effective late June. When one service takes the lead, the device is obsolete. Had to take action. Recommend and the devises are way less expensive a decade ago...

Awesome device I bought two to replace aging Roku devices, these devices are very snappy In boot times loading apps would take forever on my older devices but not on these two, apps load very quickly and wifi signal is stronger on these devices in same locations as well!

Wow, power packed little value.  Easy to set up and keep updated.  We purchased it for easy access to Disney+, but we are finding ourselves using it for much more.  There is a great feature where you can search across streaming platforms for the movie or show you are looking for.  I would strongly suggest using your phone as the remote for a more robust experience.

If I can do it, anyone can do it!  I love my Roku and can have a TV in every room now, even the bathroom!  I use the Spectrum app to get all my normal channels, including local.  I'm not sure that the Express can control the TV volume.  The Plus can.  But I just use the TV remote for the volume.

I use the Roku's for Spectrum (using Spectrum app). I wish there was a keypad on the Roku remote so I could just enter a channel number instead of using search and manually navigating through the channels. That is the ONLY reason for giving it 4 stars instead of 5. Otherwise, enjoy the product.

My only problem is that movies through the Roku don't seem to have quite as clear sound as my cable did...and since I'm a bit deaf, I end up having to turn up the volume to higher than i should just to hear conversations.  But the convenience of watching online TV without high costs is great!

Go the Roku after everyone telling me "how could I not?!"  Connected easily with my TV.  I'm still paying for TV and internet service trough a separate provider because I just haven't found a cheaper way.  But at least I can access all of the TV stations' online access and catch shows I missed when live and I couldn't DVR.  Only thing I don't like is for some reason, when we're using the ROKU, my cable remote can do some of the commands the ROKU remote does.  I have to unplug the ROKU or wait a while just to use my regular remote.

Got this for the TV in my spare bedroom & it works great. The wifi router is in another room on the other side of multiple walls and the unit still catches the signal well & I rarely get buffering. Product is intuitive and easy to use. Even my 9 year old can use it!

Absolutely love it! It was easy to set up, walked you through the process of setting it up, small, durable, and came with all you needed to hook it up. I will be buying more in the future for our other rooms. The product has a ton of channels, movies, apps, and so much more to list. On top of having Netflix and Hulu it has list upon list of free apps for tv and streaming.

I liked my old roku better this new one doesn't have a headphone jack and you have to be right in front of Roku to get it to respond I used to be able to change songs from other room while in shower......not no more......and have to reset for YouTube and Spotify to work a the time! Sometimes channels don't work and have to remove and reinstall to get them to load and respond. Syncing sucks

This is the third one of these devices that I now have and they all work great. Very easy to set up and use. These are all being used for replacement of devices that were all over five years old and really like the small amount of space they use.  Have all mounted on the top of the TV screen..

I either mis read it or was mislead, but I thought it said it has power button and volume control.  The box is exactly like another one I bought, but with that very inconvenient option omitted.  Anyway, it's fine, I just have to use the tv remote to power on and control volume.

Ordered this and the Roku stick for my senior aged parents, they've just cut the cord and have decided to go the streaming route. The Express is very easy to connect, nice interface. My only negative is the very basic remote that comes with the Express; no volume control or on/off button. I should have done better product research, but considering the low price for the device my parents can get by.

We watch a lot of Netflix and Disney + at our house and this is perfect to switch between the two with the press of one button. Roku makes screaming a breeze and is so budget friendly to add to every TV in the house. Love the new features and remote!

Beware of hacked Roku, we received this and when we tried to set it up it directed us to this website to create an account, from there it said we had to have a subscription. We called the phone number from the website where a heavy accent fellow told us we had to have a subscription and this was a new thing. We declined and returned it. After talking to a friend they had us verify the website because they just bought one and didn’t need a subscription. Turns out this website was a fake.

Easily the best value on the market today. Any/All channels are here including Apple TV - watched the season one of The Morning Show with Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon and -being quarantined as the rest of the USA - it was a fine, healthy diversion.

Absolutely love this device. I bought one for each room of my house and the family is happy so I am happy. They are fairly easy to use and don’t seem to slow down my internet, so that’s a plus. The remotes are kind of small but that’s fine since they have a version you can use on your phone. Super cool.

I bought this to replace an older model Roku that was hooked up with the old white-yellow-red plugs and was very slow.  This new Roku is FAST, came with everything needed, easy to install, no problems at all.  I'm very happy I bought a newer model.

This worked great in the playroom which does not have a smart TV. Easy to install, use is effective and efficient even for one with no technological skills. I would recommend purchasing for every tv in your home. As long as you have internet, with this you do not need to pay for high cable bills and subscription fees.  Perfect Pictures. For an affordable price.

We have cable and I wanted to add an additional TV to our cable but they said it would be $20 additional a month for one more box.  Well this does everything I needed it to do. Only needed an internet connection.  My kids love how easy it is to work as well.

Love my Roku. I have a roku TV downstairs so I bought this for my regular one in my room. Works great, just wish that it had a volume button. I don’t have a remote for my TV so I was excited thinking this would at least solve that problem, but guess not. And I hate the tag at the bottom of the remote. It annoys the crap out of me! But that’s just me lol. It works great though. I’ll definitely stick with Roku.

Installed easily in a few minutes. Only uses WiFi, does not use a network cable. We bought it because our Samsung tv app for charter tv was really slow. This is 100 times faster. Also has all the standards like Netflix and Hulu and amazon prime. All work great. Get it.

I wanted a Roku for my old analog TV. My very old Roku is not supported any longer. I read that the Roku Express would do the trick with different inputs.  But you actually have to get the Roku Express Plus. So I have to send this back. Not sure if I will reorder.

Actually I did not open the box but I did not want to penalize the seller so I gave it five stars because I am sure it’s perfect but I had to return it because I did not realize Roku’s do not record and I needed to record so I’m keeping my cable box. Sorry

As long as you have your various passwords around you can install this in about 15 minutes all in.I got this because our smart TVs were buffering and shutting down on Prime and Netflix very frequently.  It solved that problem and I stream without interruption.
Finally got sick of Spectrums cable bill and spent some serious time trying to sort all the streaming out. Settled on YouTube TV and Philo.Bought 4 of these and we are saving $100 a month

I bought it and set it up immediately. the 2nd day it started freezing itself. If I restarted it, it will be fine. Sometimes it got frozen for couple of minutes and then restarted it automatically. I didn't return it since it's still usable after restart and too lazy to return it.

I had an OOOOOooollld Roku device it was time to upgrade. Setup is easy the picture is beautiful. I'm glad to have a newer Roku. I was not able to find Disney+ with older Roku & now I have Disney+ the designated Netflix button is great . Overall I'm very satisfied

I bought two of these to use in our motorhome and they work well with a fast network or a mobile hotspot when a network isn’t available. Streaming quality is great and I have no complaints. These are just a portion of the Roku devices we own and use.

Have three Roku tvs (TCL and Sharp). Have a fire stick and a chrome cast as well. I can tell you Roku is my favorite and easiest to use.  I highly recommend this to anyone - tech savvy or those turning a TV on for the first time.Only thing I would change about me purchasing this particular unit is spending a little more for the remote that can do the TV

This remote didn't have volume control and didnt have a place to plug the earphones into the remote. No you do not have to pay an activation fee. It's free! I watched it all day and does great. Thanks

We have a 6 year old LG 3D Smart TV that LG stopped providing updates for a while back (jerks). Now the only app that works on the TV is netflix, because the software is so old. I bought this hoping it would be an inexpensive fix, and it is!  Works perfectly and was easy to set up!

This is my third Roku purchase, got it for my mom for Christmas to replace the noisy old gaming console that she was using for Netflix. Setting it up was easy, there's great customization options (background, as well as arranging channels), and my mom really loves it-- she's been using it nonstop.

Bought as a Christmas present for my daughter and after several attempts were unable to get it to work. It would start over, start an app and load to 99%,  or boot you out of programs. She thought it was her TV. We tried it on another TV and it did the same thing. Probably should have sent it back at that time.

I was disappointed with the Roku Express. One would think that “express” means it will be fast, but the Roku Express can’t even work with wifi 5G! Also it is IR only, no RF. None of this information is written on the box. You have to buy it to fine out.

Love it! Purchased it for my daughters room. Didn’t want to spend on a new smart TV so this did the trick. It works well and the picture quality is great. The only down fall is that the remote control does not have a power button to turn the TV on / off and it doesn’t have a volume button either. But it beats having to buy a new TV or having to pay for another cable box 🤗

Works great with my 75” Smart 4K HD,3D,Samsung LED TV.. better and faster than the wifi option built in tv. I was having issues with my tv buffering most the time while streaming this roku fixed the problem faster loading no more problems.

I’m was so happy with the first ROKU I bought, I bought more! Now every TV in my home has a ROKU. Installation was easy; although, I would recommend a laptop or PC for the activation. I couldn’t get it to activate on my phone. Plus I can watch the ROKU channel on my phone after downloading the app. The picture quality is also good.

This is my second Roku purchase! I love this device because it allows us to watch multiple channels! Keep up to date on everything. Still have not purchased extra channels but we have enough to keep us busy by exploring additional free channels. Easy device to install!

I have Roku sticks elsewhere in my house. I love them. I bought this for my bedroom. I return the first one after it stopped working after two weeks. I thought it was a glitch. The replacement doesn’t work either. I am returning it for another Roku stick. They work great!

I bought this as a present for my Dad, and he absolutely loves it. He can watch TV from his desk and comfortably pan between apps. He doesn't have cable, but he does pay for a few subscriptions like Netflix, and this helps him access those with ease.The roku channel is also great for free movies!

Does what it should.  Flawless setup and operation.  I'm so glad I chose Roku over its proprietary (Amazon, Apple) competitors.  Great interface.  Wide choice of channels.  Reliable, high quality streaming.  Wish it had an internet browser.  Perhaps that's coming...

had an apple tv but it was an older model so i was unable to download any new apps and did not want to spend hundreds on a new one so i bought this. it was easy set up especially since i already have a roku account for my smart tv in my living room and i was able to download the apps i use most

We have had this device for four months and it's already broken down and I have to buy a new one. This is not the time to have to buy new things and just got one and there's been nothing done to it it hasn't been moved to hasn't been broken. This is ridiculous

This is my second Roku box, was very impressed with the first one, so I got it for the spare tv. Although the fire stick is also good, the tiny remote is so easily lost. The Roku remote is small, but not so small that it easily gets lost.

Bought to use with my 2015 Samsung smart tv. Sooo easy to install and use. Can't believe there's comments distracting people from a way to end cable bills. The picture on my tv is even better now and I ditched Spectrum's high bills and my little girl still gets all her cartoons. All you need Wi-Fi.

Although the Roku has a place to turn closed caption on, it never worked for me. Unfortunately I still have two of the new Roku units. I was considering replacing my TV but decided to try the Fire Stick. With the Fire Stick in operation, I now have Closed Caption.
Bought for my 67 year old mother. She hasnt left the couch since, and rarely calls me anymore. WIN!

Very pleased with this purchase. Set up was super easy. The interface is intuitive and easy to navigate. The remote may be a little too simple as I am not always sure which button to use, but that may just be me. Certainly worth the money.

I only bought this after reading a question stating that the xfinity stream app would work on it.  It does not on this model.  I’m very disappointed that the app does not work on all models.  It makes very little sense.  I kind of want to send them back....

This is yhe smallest roku that you do not have to point your remote directly at.  Have 2 roku ultras and purchased this for a friend in the hospital.  Works like a charm!  Highly recommend not only for the size and portability, but also for the price!
Great product! Worked right out of the box, bad reviews may because people set it up wrong?

I just got this today and have never used any kind of streaming before. it was so easy to set up and it never asked me for an activation fee. You do have to create a roku account but its free.  Plugged it in to my hdmi and to the power outlet and that was it. follow the onscreen prompts to set up home screen. I couldnt believe how easy it was!

May not be an issue for you if you are new to Roku. This is our 5th one and I bought this one without realizing there is no volume button on the remote. We had volume on the others so this feels like a step backwards. And inconvenient. Ugh.

Lots to like about Roku express hd, but I bought it to use with Bluetooth headphones and the lag and disconnections make this product unusable. The latency and dropped connection from private listening are terrible and ruin and otherwise wonderful product. Bummer.

My first Roku was getting long in the tooth and the remote was slow to respond. I picked this one and I'm thrilled with the speed and content of the Roku as well as the ease of use. Since dropping cable TV and saving so much money a month life is much better and this device adequately fills the void!

For the price, this thing is so great. I'm also a complete luddite and it was super easy to set up. My smart TV is a bit old and I couldn't get some apps on it. It was also just kind of janky to use. This has made things much smoother. Coronavirus lockdown has been improved!

Like the menu and available applications. Remote response Is quick.There are audio-to-video synchronization issues when using the Roku iOS app on my iPhone and with earbuds plugged in, to listen/watch quietly. Aside from this glitchy problem of the audio going out of synch with the video—that happens quite frequently (and is fixed by disconnecting and reconnecting the audio route using the app) it works pretty well.
I bough it for a friend who ty is not a smart tv hook it is it earl great the picture is much clearer, love it I wish I had bough it first instead of the smart DVD player. It work great.

Very happy with the product but beware of scammers intruding in the installation process demanding extra payment. Roku should do a better job of preventing that and/or warning purchasers of the threat of being scammed as I was.

Me encantó el producto, el control me pareció muy desactualizado, hacerlo más digital ahorraría tiempo a la hora de escribir lo que uno está buscando. Quizás ese es el único descontento, el control, aunque su tamaño es perfecto. En líneas generales es un excelente producto salvando ese detalle mencionado anteriormente

I love Roku and it's user interface!! This one is great. I love that it also has Disney + on the remote! It also has Apple TV. My older Roku will not allow me to download the Apple TV app. I have no idea why. But this one does, so I'm happy!

I bought this to replace the fire stick my daughter stole out of my room. I like it! The menu is easy to navigate and it is very fast. No issues with buffering or skipping while watching. I also love the layout of the remote, I just wish it had voice commands and TV volume control.

Love, Love, Love our Roku's!! Originally purchased for my daughter's TV when Disney + came out as her TV didn't support the new app and we thought it was so awesome and convenient. We ended up ordering another one to travel with. We went away for 2 weeks over Christmas and it was so great being able to access our apps at other people's houses and even in our hotel room. Once you initially set it up (which is really easy), plug it into any tv and all your apps are signed in and ready to be watched. Can't beat the price.

Only Netflix works reliably on this thing. Hulu needs to be re-registered every time it starts and fails with network errors 3 to 4 times before it works. Sling shows a black screen for any show you pick until you try starting it a few times. This is on a fiber network where other streaming devices work fine. Although I will say that Hulu is a bad streaming service on any device and fails with the weirdest errors

I love this. I bought it for my kids room. Comes with all the good movie apps.  Plus loads of free ones.  Was super easy to hook up. Remote is very durable. (Kids drop remotes alot!) So if I tell you it's well made! It is!! ❤❤

Although my Roku LT was still working (8 years old!) the LT is being phased out and no longer supported with updates from Roku. I replaced the LT with this and this Express is much faster at loading the show I want to watch. I have no issues with it being only on the 2.4 band on my router.

Great purchase, great features,definitely recommend buying it. Please do not call the number to install. It’s a scam, they will tell you you have to pay to install, when it clearly says it’s free. Just look it up on google.Just an update: after just a few months the roku is

Very easy to use and set up! I got this so I could stream Netflix and Amazon Prime video. I like that I can also stream Spotify and Amazon music through it as well. There’s so much you can do with this little thing! Definitely worth $30!

Purchased this Roku to allow family to receive Disney on our tv.  It works great with the exception that it does not allow the hdmi cable connection to switch back to another channel.  Rather than sending it back, I just unplug the power when not using it.

I could not be happier with this purchase. Our SmartTV was one year too old to be able to get Disney+ on it via Samsung Apps, so I did some digging & found this. This is the cheapest option to getting a Firestick or the Apple thing & does exactly what we need. Took 15 min to set up from start to finish. Just follow the set up pamphlet. Type in the exact URL or you might get sent to a scam site. This doesn’t require any extra fees or activation subscriptions. All my streaming in 1 spot! LOVE IT!

I heard about Roku from a friend of mine and finally decided to take the plunge and get my own. SO GLAD I DID!! Thi unit is nice and small, was easy to set up, and runs great! So nice to be able to stream all my favorite movies and shows on my tv instead of watching everything on my phone like I was.

I have one of these on each of our TV's in the house. As long as you have a good internet connection, these devices are a great alternative if you want to ditch cable or satellite. Picture quality is just as good as cable or satellite.

I love this new set. It replaced an older box. The setup was fast and easy. Also, there are at lot of extra channels that I didn't have to select. There were some channels I couldn't get on the old box, which was frustrating, so I opted to update. I'm very happy I did.
Great product and fast shipping. I prefer this product over other streaming devices. Clean interface and fast. Love the remote control.

Now we can watch movies without worrying about internet signals, which is a problem in our valley. So each to install and use, takes only a few minutes. Small unit takes up almost no space on TV cabinet or shelf. Highly recommend.

Before you buy this. Check the remote if it has everything that need like volume and mute buttons, power button, and voice botton. In my opinion that this one was very cheap, but l was so dumb of buying this. Why, because the remote didn't came TV control bottons and voice. Also the signal for this wasn't strong enough just because how we need to place it with a sticking that wasn't strong enough also and place it where it can signal the remote just only two rooms that require to throw the sticking stuff away and place it without it. I recommended to buy the Roku Streaming Stick Plus, it needs to be the Newest Model, because it better. Thank you.

We got rid of cable after getting our Roku box, because it has almost all of your streaming needs in one platform (AppleTV being the exception). We use it for Netflix, YouTubeTV (replaces cable easily with cheaper subscription), NHL, Amazon Prime video, Disney+, and music through Spotify.

Really nice quality without spending an arm and a leg! I bought this for my sons bedroom so he could watch YouTube kids. I didn’t want to buy anything expensive, because, well let’s face it - BOYS. And I am not let down by this little thing at all! We love it! Quality is great, picture quality is great, user friendly interface. And I didn’t have to use a credit card to buy it! Win win for everyone!

Weakest WiFi xmitter imaginable. Absolutely MUST be located in clear line of sight with modem or it will either buffer constantly or not work at all. Completely useless without buying a repeater or moving your modem to the same room as TV.

Replaces monthly cable box rental...(Yes, I still have cable because I like XFINITY & how it lets me better control teen’s WiFi usage & alerts me if someone is trying to connect to my WiFi, etc. I know, most folks are cutting the cord.) Anyway, if you have XFINITY you can download the streaming app to Roku & access all programming, your recordings, set recordings, etc. Better than paying extra box rental fees every month.

This device started making the shows I was watching pause a lot. Didn’t have this issue with any other Roku devices that we have. Custom service was a nightmare. Long wait times. They hang up on you at the end of your long wait time. Then when you do get them, you can’t understand a word they say and they are rude.

I like Roku and have owned several versions. I was excited about this new version. However, the CBS All Access and Amazon Prime apps “lose” connectivity EVERY day; sometimes, even rebooting the Roku doesn’t help, and I have to keep closing and opening the apps for 15 minutes or longer. Yet Netflix always works the first time. This should not happen since all apps use the same network connection.I have the latest firmware installed and no outstanding updates.

I bought this roku to replace the roku stick I had on our tv in our living room. My boys lost the remote so we were using my phone as the remote. I put the stick in my room. ;) This one works perfectly as it should on my tv. I have had no problems connecting it to my tv or to my wifi. I recommend roku to everyone.

We found this really easy to use! The ads are a little annoying but overall it’s been totally worth it. Has all the apps we need and is easy to navigate. The one thing I would change would be to add a TV power button to the remote but that’s just me being lazy.

i have zero complaints about this roku. i already have a older one i my house and this one was so easy to set up. I had it plugged in & working way faster than i expected. im not very tech savvy so i was very pleased that it worked so well.

Amazed at how a little thing like this took a 15 yr old TV and made it like a Smart TV.  Upped the picture quality to 1080, and allows us to watch Netflix and other shows that we would have to pay too much for with Cable or Dish.  Very easy to install, easy to program

Fought with ISP as well as mfr of router to vey this to connect wirelessly (network would not recognize , neither were of any help, but eventually sussed out a solution. No issues with the Roku, though, they make their end of things a snap.

We have 6 Roku TVs between our home and our cabin, and wanted the same interface for the other TVs around the house.  Needed three of these for "dumb" TVs in the exercise room and offices.  Having all TVs as Roku TVs makes life so much simpler!

I purchased a second Roku Express for my bedroom TV.  I had to activate it separately.  When I went on Google the first thing that popped up was to add a Roku device and activation BUT I didn't realize that it was from a site other than Roku proper.  I went through the steps as they asked me to and then they came back with the statement that there is a fee for a second Roku device.  I then knew it was a scam.  I logged out and found the Roku proper site, activated the second device with no payment needed and it works beautifully!

Seriously though, this thing is amazing. Purchased to supplement my older model Smart TV whose app store doesn't offer Disney+. Ultimately decided to just use this exclusively in alternative to the TV's interface. It has friggin everything. Every app known to god and man. You really don't even need to use anything else. I synced my HBO, Prime Video, Netflix, Disney, Redbox, Pandora, Hulu and Apple TV accounts and it's basically cable. I love it. My kids enjoy the easy accesss of having a Disney button right on the remote. Really neat device.

I cut the Direct TV cord and bought this for my one tv that is not wifi capable. Seriously so easy even I could set it up. Downloaded Spectrum streaming app and it works perfectly. Very happy and saving $100  a month.

This is nice. It is very EASY to set up and connect to your tv. The only thing I do not like is it seems to “buffer” more than I feel like it should. I also have a Roku tv in my living room and it has never done that.
This is the fourth streaming equipment this week just to get disney+. Roku was easy to install and the Disney app was already there.

My kids love it. They are able to watch just about anything they want (kid approved of course). I actually like it better than my fire stick shop I spend a lot of time in my kids room taking over their TV like they use to do mine!

My only complaint is that it didn’t come with an HDMI cord. It must have been returned or something. Also no volume control on remote. Pros- Fast shipping, good quality. I do prefer the smart TVs with Rocky built in. I bought those for my kids and they’re great!

I have an older SMART TV with a great screen but was not able to get newer services.  Using this ROKU Media Player is like having a new TV and the sound on my external speaker bar is so much better.  Best money spent for tech lately as for me.

I purchased this to switch to Hulu, Sling, etc and end my huge monthly cable bill! This product was easy to install/understand & I can't wait to sign up with Hulu and enjoy same thing I am getting now (pretty much) & reducing my cable bill!!
Cut my cable off and just using internet and roku channel apps! Saves us money! Never going back to cable again!

I needed a way to watch multiple channels on my office tv without having to get a new cable box. This was a great option I was able to download a ton of channels as well as Amazon Prime video and Netflix. Really a great option to cable.

I got this for my second TV because it was cheaper than a Fire Stick... Get the Fire Stick or spring for the more expensive Roku. Miss being able to control volume from my streaming remote and the interface feels a little outdated. It does allow you to customize the menu and screensaver unlike the Fire Stick and doesn't have Amazon's continuous adds. I never had a problem with the adds though, I like to know what's coming out. It also doesn't support twitch. :(

Purchased this to replace my Apple TV and I love it. Very affordable and user friendly. Small in size and you can place it virtually anywhere. Works great even with older TVs. Comes with everything you need.

This product worked great for the first three months before it started dropping internet connection. Every other internet connected device works except this one and now it's past it's warranty. Too bad, I really thought every thing about this was great.

This works better than my old Roku box.  Much faster.  They say it has a microphone for voice-activated search.  Don't like that feature.  I'll keep it in a cigar box when not in use!  Easy to watch Amazon Prime movies  with this unit.

I have an LG TV just a few years old, but old enough YouTube TV isn’t available to load as an app. Enter this perfect little device to fill in the blank! Love that it can be powered via a USB port too. Now just have one power cord to the TV and nothing else.

Bought this to use but my mom ended up hogging it and using it all the time after I taught her how to use it. She basically just goes on YouTube and watch Chinese shows.Love that it’s so easy to use and only like $30! My parents ended up recommending it to my aunt and grandpa and now they’ve got Rokus too!

I haven't watched anything yet but it's the easiest no glitch tech set up I've ever done.  It turned an 8 yr old Sony smart TV into a genius tv that gets Disney+.  And everything else. Mission accomplished.I'll update if any issues.

It was a good price to update for my spare TV which on my old Roku I couldn't get the Disney + was easy to install the only problem was now now with your other streaming download they want you to verify that it you besides that it's a a nice little unit

Will be returning for something stronger. Often pauses to tv to buffer with good internet. Network test only shows download speeds to device at 1mb - 3mb at most on a 1gb connection. Not impressed in the least. Menu operation is also laggy.

A++++. EXACTLY what I needed. I stream via my Xbox One. I needed something that would allow me to stream APPLE+ and Disney to my 10yr old Samsung.Was a SYNCH to hookup. Epitome of “plug and play”. Plug it in, follow prompt (select network/enter PW and select apps you want to use). Was ready in 5 minutes.
Easiest way to watch TV and stop paying 6.99 monthly to Xfinity for that small Lele box by getting the Xfinity streaming app

I only had one problem with this device. It kept dropping off the network. My Router is in the first floor and this Roku was hooked up to a TV on the second  floor. Swapped it with an older ROKU I have. the older one never dropped the signal.

It doesn’t work it’s slow and laggy when you click on any channel or movie or YouTube it doesn’t skip or click on time . It needs to be fixed . After a few days if u try to use WiFi or hotspot it won’t allow any connection please fix this problem

I bought 2 of these so I could put one in the living room and one in our master. I really liked that I could mount it to the soundbar in the living room with the removable tape. We have been using them non-stop since we got them and they work very well. There has been no lag and it gives us access to all the streaming services we needed.

I love that everything I watch is on one device now, Disney+, Hulu, Vudu, Netflix, Tubi. espn. Great quality and the shortcuts on the bottom of the remote are great, the app with the mobile remote works amazing!

Love the roku systems. They are used friendly and simple for most people who dont understand streaming devices. They allow access to more channels than other devices like the fire TVs. Easy connection to channel subscription with cable providers (ie HBOGO works on here still with Xfinity but not on fire devices; I believe die to contact issues).Highly recommended for anyone new to streaming devices.

This is probably the Roku you need for most basic setups. I don't believe it gives you the upmost capabilities of video and HD but it was perfect for a bedroom setup. There is no power button and I have found it continues using data at night when it is not being used. That makes me wonder if it is doing that during the day as well making streaming slower on other devices.

Works well. I use it with my Roku phone app for private listening when others are asleep in house. Better than using other Roku models' remote with headphone adapter....that ate through remote batteries. Like this much better.

Outstanding for the cost. THERE IS NO CONNECTION CHARGE as some other reviews have warned about. The owner's manual warns of scams and cautions to enter the correct web site when activating the system.
Worked great for a few months.Now it wont keep an internet connection.

Bought for kids room. Decided to go with this instead of the firestick because it was cheaper. Same apps. I think it is easier to navigate though. And you can customize what & where you want the apps to be. Comes with everything you need to hook it up plus very easy directions. Even has a sticker to have the actual streamer to not get lost and sit to your tv. And had a on-screen tutorial. Loved how I knew what I was doing even though I never had one because of this. Super user friendly

My only advice is to have your pc or tablet near by when you initially set it up.It's easy to use. I just wish it had a volume control on it so it could eliminate the need to have another remote on hand.

Works pretty well. Had no issues for the first 2 days and now occasionally during a video I get an error message. The sound continues to play but the video is gone. Had to change the HDMI already. Not sure what happenes there. Otherwise works great

I bought this just to bypass the Netflix app built into my Vizio TV. I'm very happy with it! I just wish it had volume and power buttons on the remove, but I suppose that's why Roku makes another slightly more expensive version with these features.

Simple and easy to use. With the recent updates from Netflix and others, older smart TVs can't update the app on the TV. This inexpensive accessory has made the migration easy, with tons of additional channels--some free.  Just add Internet.

Once it was installed, I love it. I had to have someone help me load my Xfinity streaming code over the phone and on my chromebook at the same time.  Just be careful what you install there can be a limited free TV.  I use Pluto/Tubi/ and Roku  those 3 have been great so far.  Also great for updates with local and national weather and News on other Free installments.

Love love Roku TV remote!  It is so easy to install and use. Other remotes take forever to type in your email/password for different apps, but Roku remote makes entering info so easy!  They only reason I didn’t give the remote 5 stars is because I wish I had ordered the Roku remote that you can control the volume and turning the TV on.  I know that’s petty but if you don’t want to have to use 2 remotes, make sure the Roku remote you get has that on it.

Not compatible for some reason to some TCL tv’s for some reason (picture, no sound) but I’m pretty sure this is the fault of TCL and not roku. Other than that, we love our Rokus and have 4 of them throughout our house..

It’s great I love it . I’m not to good at setting things up . But it was super easy . Also free tv great movies and tv . They have a lot of free apps . Then also Netflix Hulu and prime . You can also add any tv app and YouTube . Great price came fast .

I am a fan of Roku streaming device.I bought roku express to replace old version of roku stick which I used for 5years.This version is updated.It has many free channel.No need to pay expensive for cable.

It took me about a year to figure out closed captioning, and I hate not having a headphone jack in the remote. It plays quality HD video. Has some issues adding random channels, but hasn't cost me money thankfully.

I have been using a Roku Ultra, Premier and built-into-TV system for years now and I love them all!  This being said, the Roku Express is a poor product.  It continuously looses Internet connection, takes some time to load channels, occasionally resets when hitting the HOME button and the picture quality is lower than any of my other devices.  I used my Roku Premier in the same location (as I'm using the Express) a lot and no problems at all.If you want an affordable Roku device, I'd recommend no lower than the Premier; I'll be returning this and getting that.

It works great! Good service and quality for the price. Cute little remote with big icons for the big channels. We're in a tiny town with inadequate ridiculous cable. And in an old building but this works fine with the complex's WiFi.

I really love using the Roku.  I use Roku on two other tv's in the house.  The response is so quick that I'm thinking of hooking another tv up with it even though it is a smart tv.  The response and channel selection is so quick and easy.

Yay! We upgraded from our old Roku and this one is great. Only wish the cord was a tiny bit longer because of how we have our tv set up- but it sits happily next to the tv for us. Our old Roku was old and would shut off when we watched any NBC app shows. New one is perfect

Roku's are great, easy to setup and navigate...however, as you'll see when you check the reviews in the Alexa app, Roku can often not connect with Echo. I had the same issue. It's a luxury setting, I understand that, but if it's advertised as "working with alexa" then it should probably do that.
Works as needed most of the time

esta muy emocionada por recibir un Roku porque tengo una television que ya incluye Roku. Nos gusto mucho tener Netflix y Youtube en nuestra tele. Cuando recibi el producto, trate de instalarlo con el codigo que me dieron. No se puedo hacer y llame al servico al cliente. Me estaban diciendo que tenia que comprar un paqueta de 100 dollares ara poder activar Roku. Esto se ha hizo un enchange y estafa por todavia tengo que gastar mas dinero. Yo solamente lo queria para el Youtube y Netflix pero me estaban diciendo que no es asi. trate de preguntarles que es lo que vende Roku, y nunca me decian. Estoy my decepcionada por esto.

Like, years ago. Great idea - concept implemented well. So much to watch. Disney + app accessible which makes this great for "smart" TVs that aren't that smart. Prefer the non-miked remote, but this is still really great. I have three of these now!

The Roku works great but after you watch it for a few hours straight you have to reload the Roku then it works great again.. l think you need to reset it cause it can only hold so much information.. But l like it and it works great..

when hulu goes to commercial screen freezes on commercial. looked this up and has been a roku prpblem since january and they have not fixed. returning both. do not buy. none of the fixes suggested worked and no customer service due to covid.

Works great. I no longer rent my remote control from my TV carrier.  The only draw back you can’t jump stations. You have to go thru each channel. I downloaded my carrier’s app - easy, other apps/stations too.
Very easy to setup and works with Hulu live. I had the older style Roku’s prior to these. I love them. I’ve never had any problems. I was able to swap them out easily.

I have a pretty low rate data connection, so it doesn't get the best resolution.  Not really Roku's fault, but it is an issue.  There is plenty of stuff to see on the free channels.  But you will be paying for anything beyond the basic selection.

Thanks to a friend's tip, I was able to save money and stream my home cable tv to other tvs in the house.  Easy connection and set up.  Do wish the remote had volume control as my remote with my Roku TV has.

As expected if you are a roku streaming device user. If this is your first time owning a streaming stick or device. Its easy to install. It can't be jailbroken like the firestick. It great if you also are a spectrum cable subscriber, you can eliminate the use of a cable box. Hope this is helpful.

Very hard to navigate without hitting other buttons - last version had keys raised at a good height - the sleeker design looks good but doesn’t work well.And - why take away the possibility of using earphones for private listening -bad idea.

I really wish I would have ordered this sooner! It was so easy to set up and link my accounts also. The only thing I can complain about is every now and then at the beginning of a program the picture will be blurry or pixelated but then it buffers or something and the picture clears beautifully. I'm thinking about ordering one for my in laws and my mother because of how easy and great this product is.

I switched over from my very glitchy Amazon stick. In my opinion, Roku is a lot more user friendly and has more free channels. Glad I didn't splurge on the Apple TV! I saved so much by going with Roku, and I am very happy with it!

After BluRay & game system platforms no longer supported several streaming channels, I ordered this and wonder why I waited so long!?  Control from your phone?! Every channel desired is supported ... so I ordered a second.
This is truly the best streaming device I've ever owned. It's quick and snappy with no annoying lag, lockups or freezes like my Amazon Fire stick. Setup is easy and it's really small. I love it!

I bought a cheep Samsung TV and it was so slow starting up and switching from one video to the next that I hated using it. I bought the ROKU and it is super fast. The only down side is that now I have two remotes.

What I like Roku Express most are  . 1. got some free movies to watch. 2.  play YouTube on TV. 3. play YouTube on iPhone 6s and mirror (or cast) on TV through Roku setup.only inconvenience is using iPhone as remote(by Roku app downloaded ) to search YouTube.  Keyboard words typing on iPhone is not showing on YouTube TV screen and searching is not complete. Not sure issue is YouTube or Roku. I asked Roku. No answer yet.

Plug an play! Super easy to install and probably the best "smart TV" adapter available, esp at the cost. I love Roku and I've owned the fire stick and Chromecast, which I honestly would never own again. Got this for my roommate who has an "old" 1080p 32". She's been streaming Disney+ for 3 days!

This product is ok. It streams great and is easy to get around the Roku platform. My only complaint is that the remote does not have any volume or power buttons. Requiring you to always need 2 remotes; which is a pain.
Upon initial setup, once the software updated, just got a blank screen.  I find these worthless.

This is definitely changing the way I look at cable. I bought this & fell in love, it is well worth my money. You can download plenty of apps. I use slot of the apps to keep my son amused. He is 1 & loves watching rerun programs back to back, Super Why, Elmo, sesame street, the baby 1St channel,etc. Only catch is that some channels you have to pay for monthly, but to replace a $200-$300 cable bill a month, it's WORTH it.

It was very easy to set up and to operate.  I was blown away by the amount of movies and TV shows that you could watch for free.  It also allows you to choose when you want to watch a program and make it work your schedule and not be tied to theirs..

The setup for the Roku is simple enough but the unit majorly failed as it stopped working during the software update and never came back up! Very disappointed and no way to know what went wrong as the tv screen stayed black and no clues were provided. I could surmise that the software was corrupted, no way to know for sure. I ordered a replacement and if it fails, I’m done forever with Roku!!
This product was sooo easy to set up!! The quality is awesome! The remote control is easy to use as well. Definitely recommend.

Definitely make sure to have good WiFi or you’ll get allot of buffering. Seems super easy to use and I still think I’ll keep it for the kids room. Gonna play with it some more and see if it just takes some adjusting. Hopefully the buffering doesn’t get more irritating.
my tv is a older smart 4k tv. However no youtube tv access. I now can access it and many other features on my tv with this item. The remote is easy to use as well. I highly recommend this item.
I wish that there were numbers on the remote for instances where you stream xfinity and are looking for channels. Its very tedious to use the up and down arrows, thus 4 stars

I hooked this up with my projector to have a nice home theatre setup. This Roku stick offers a great way to be able to watch videos seamlessly. Setup was incredibly smooth, only requiring 10 minutes and was rather straightforward. Would recommend to anyone looking for a quick and easy way to stream media on any display.
Easy to set up and use. Very happy with purchase. The difference between this and the more expensive ones is that this doesn't have a volume control or an off/on button. Works just as well though.

So, when using this device and using Hulu, the screen will freeze when a commercial is done. Sound keeps going for your show, but screen is stuck on the commercial. Our older Roku device is fine, just this express version. Apparently LOTS of people struggling with same problem.
Very easy to set up and I like that it's a small device that doesn't take up much room.It was very easy to set up and works great we love it, it was also a great price on Amazon.

We finally cancelled our satellite service and now stream. The Roku was super easy to set up. I like the Sling and Netflix shortcut buttons. I wish the remote had volume control. Otherwise, I really like using it.
I have bought about 12 Roku's I have 5 in my house and have given others as gifts it was loved by all. I still use my original one. Bought many years ago before they were popular.

Love my new Roku! I will probably never buy a different streaming device. I think thru the years I have purchased 4 or 5. This one was replacing my bedroom’s Roku that stopped working after many years of service. Very simple to install, user friendly and I highly recommend Roku!

I was using a super old Roku system on my TV and my daughter convinced me to upgrade to this newer system. So glad I did! Great picture quality, seamless streaming, and very fast. Great, affordable product!

Love it so easy to set up already had a roku tv but tv in my living room was a smart but not roku ready roku has made it so easy to set up just plug it in and follow on screen menus could not be any easier

Love this roku device, I HATE the sticky strip they give you. It sucks big time and once you try to apply it and don’t get it lined up perfectly in one shot, you can’t reuse it. Otherwise great streaming device.
So easy to use and install! I love how small it is. Comes with adhesive strip that I can just stick it on my wall mounted tv no furniture required. Can stream all my favorite platforms.

I was scammed. I wish I had read the reviews. This is the fifth Roku I’ve purchased. When I tried to set up the unit the code number wouldn’t work so I called the customer support  number on the screen on the screen. He told me that Roku was now charging an activation fees 70  for 2 years 100 for 5 years and 150 for lifetime. He had a foreign accent. I’m returning the unit since it’s infected with a fraud program.

We don't have a 4k, and don't need to talk into the remote, so for $30 this little guy does the trick. Easy to set up, and it's very small, you can even take it on vacation with you if you please. Money well spent.

My mom loves it. Got it for her smart tv/spectrum experience.  I love mine as well but I didn’t purchase it from Amazon. I use mine with Netflix, Prime & Apple TV. I also watch Pluto & IDGO on itHighly recommended!

The streaming function works great as do all the Roku products.  HOWEVER, the remote does not work if the streaming box is in a cabinet or behind the TV.  We specifically bought this Roku for a wall-mounted TV for which we have nowhere to place the box and get line of sight to the remote.  It would have been good to know this before purchasing it.  This is a step back from other older Rokus that we own.

I hooked this up myself, it was very easy. Instructions are simple. I am not technically skilled at all and I had no difficulty. Has all the apps we were looking for. Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Video, Disney, and many others. Very pleased.

Be cautious when going to the instructed website to activate , if it asks you for credit card get out and try again. I had to but when I got the actual website it was fast and easy. Overall happy with the purchase. Other reviews said no tech support , I don't know about that but the seller will contact you back quickly.

Bought this for friends of mine.  I love Roku and have one build into my TV.  They are really enjoying it and have learned to navigate it well.  They are older and not the most tech savvy.  Great value!

This is my second one I've ordered this year. It's affordable and it has everything you need to stream television. You can also add other streaming channels. My 4 year old can navigate it all by himself. I highly recommend.

I find it better than Chromecast and Firestick TV. Only thing is that you can't mirror image your device. It does have a large variety of apps for streaming. You can also download the spectrum app and not need a cable box to view your channel listing.

This is a great product. Easy to install and easy to setup. If your TV has USB ports, get this product for 4K streaming at its finest. You also get access to MANY free shows. Great product, easy installation, easy setup. What could be better.
I like that it works much better than the stick type I am replacing. Not as many features but it works much better.

I had a firestick in the living room and it decided not to work any longer.  This was on sale and I though that I would give it a shot.  I really love the controller and the different choices that I have in tv programming.

Very easy to install as a replacement for my very old Roku 2x, which had started to finally give up the ghost. My TV is quite old for a flat screen (probably 2006), but there were no issues with the setup.

Got Disney Plus but my TV did not support it.  This little unit runs my Disney Plus and runs Netflix better than the TV.  Also does Showtime, HBO Now, Starz HGTV, Google Play and more.  Easy to install.

Product came well packaged, everything described was in the packaged.came with two batteries which is good, remote is sturdy , only issue was the region i hooked up too, am unable to stream but its good cord cutter .

It keeps looping. It will ask to connect to the internet then ask for a software update that will take you so long then it will reset and do the same thing again. I tried connecting it for 5 times took me an hour or more. Buy something else. Waste of time
Installed on my "old" TV (No smart)First setup internet connection.
best.  thing.  ever.  nothing else to say really.  it's been great having this since i don't have cable. Nice to be able to watch my tv when looking at Hulu or Netflix instead of my computer.
It seems to have a problem streaming Hulu. No issues with any other app. Ive ran all the tests, done all the reboots (multiple times) and still has a buffering bug. Maybe just mine, it still happens.

I purchased an updated Roku to utilize Private listening mode. We have a previous model with that feature and I wanted it on my other TV too. This one is terrible. The audio cuts out all the time and it is almost useless. The other model we have is several years old and works perfect.

While somehow it dudnt worked on our Vizio tv. It did work with our TLC brand. Installation was pretty fast and really easy. Im still not sure and would like to know whu it disnt work with out other tv? Hmm.. Im happy with it anyways.
We have used Roku since before it was cool! Years and years ago, we hear about this little device that could allow us to stream instead of pay those cable bills out the Wazoo!!! Big fans here!

Love this. Have one in every room of our house. Worth every penny and dont have to pay a ridiculous cable bill. Very very much worth the price. Tons of free movies and channels as well as access to you tube.

I had this for a month never opened it, I just inboxed it today and it doesn’t work at all it doesn’t come on at all I tried everything and I can’t even return it because it’s past the return window date

This is a poor quality item it was used as a gift and the person who received the item was very dissatisfied but I did not request a refund because of the timeline be careful when purchasing this item from other buyers

LOVE ROKU DEVICE.DON'T LIKE REMOTE WITH OTHER CHANEL BUTTONS. THEY ARE A DISTRACTION, AND EASILY ACTIVATED WHEN REMOTE IS FACE DOWN ACTIVATING COMPETING APPS. HOWEVER,THE ROKU STREAMERS ARE VERY GOOD WITH ALL APPS/CHANNELS, BUT THERE ARE FREQUENT GLITCHES, OR INCOMPATIBILITY ISSUES WITH AMAZON APPS.  WHEN  AMAZON APPS WORKS IT IS GREAT, BUT FOR THIS TO HAPPEN THE GLITCHES AND INTERRUPTED STREAMING WITH ROKU DEVICES  HAS TO STOP.

Works great with my Hulu, Netflix, Amazon and other streaming channels. Easy to add and delete channels. However, they have the worst technical service I have ever encountered!  That being said we have two of them and I would buy them again.

Absolutely LOVE this product! I bought two, one for my master bedroom and one for my guest room, and they work amazingly, and are easy for me and my family to use. You can’t beat such a great product for the price!
I saved soo much money by returning cable boxes. This was a great investment

I have used Roku for 10 years, and this is the best one yet. The setup took only 10 minutes and I just love the updates on the visuals. I have an older TV and this plugged right into the USB with no issues. I highly recommend Roku to everyone. You will honestly never miss cable.

Have had to factory reset the Roku Express 3 different times in a matter of less than 24 hours. It kicks me out of any of the apps I am on after approximately 5 minutes. When I am watching something and it goes to commerce, it freezes on the commercial but continues to play the audio. I have heard nothing but good about Rokus, and was super excited to have one! Not going to lie, kind of regretting it. Should have gotten a Fire stick. Not worth the money!

My only real complaint is this: “Since the remote is used as the main unit, why not put a configurable VOLUME control or a MUTE button on it??”  It’s frustrating to be forced to use a 2nd remote just for sound!

We love this! We got it to stream all of our networks with shows and movies. Picture quality is great amd its easy to use! We should have gotten one sooner. I think we may have to purchase another one soon!

Got this for my 8yo to get him out of my room and off my Roku tv.  After I got it Roku said I had a 1 time fee of 50.00 to set up another device in my house. NOPE! It works fine without that extra cash going out.

I like this device overall; except for the short power cable, but mainly, the buggy apps (specifically the YouTube app) that can be installed. The YouTube app suffers frequent lockups and crashes, particularly, when transitioning from one video to another. The connection is fine ; but the apps seems to get hung-up, and restarts itself. Its very frustrating to say the least.
Love it! The easiest and fastest set up for the most technically unsophisticated of us. The price of $29 is so affordable! Love the size - small & perfect to take with you to wherever you travel

After setting up the Roku, I noticed that you could not turn your tv on or off from the Roku remote nor does the remote have a volume control. I should have checked out the features better.  I have other Rokus and all of them have these features.  I assumed that any Roku product would offer the aforementioned options.  You know the saying about assuming.  Lesson learned.

Has a weird tendency to pause the video while changing the volume, which can get annoying. Not very happy that it forces you to give payment info during setup.I do generally like the software interface, which is quick and responsive. It has crashed on me 1 time in the last few months, it overall it works well, minus the annoyances already mentioned.

Was hard for me to get use to at first although it was a short courtship to love. This is the only way to go, for streaming in my book! I haven’t had tv in 5 years and was great to watch tv shows again too
This is extremely quick and smooth compared to every other streaming device I’ve had over the years. I really enjoy the roku. It’d be nice if it supported 5ghz for WiFi but still works fine.

Why is it paired with Alexa as a necessity?? I spent more than twice as much than needed because in the description it said you must use with Alexa Dot. It didn't need that at all.  I was not happy that I was misled.

IN SEVEN (7)  TIMES I INTEND TO GET THIS, AND  CAN'T. WHAT IS THE MATTER WITH THIS? PEOPLE. I DID NOT RECOMMEND THIS PIECE OF J.....TO ANYONE. I ACCESS EVERY PAGE OF ROKU, AND THERE IS NO PLACE WHERE I CAN FIND AN ANSWER.
I absolutely love the Roku! Set up was super easy, I am so happy to be able to watch all my subscriptions easily now. And I really like that it also connects to Google play

This item was a gift for my mother she is a older woman and doesn't have cable in her bedroom she loves it she has so many shows that she can watch but with the economy changing this is a great item to have I have 2 myself
Excelente, muy fácil de usar me ha servido ya que mi tele dejó de agarrar el wifi roku fué la mejor opción para no tirar mi tele, con pluto tv y web videocaster me entretiene bastante.
I love Roku my roommate used it for years and now I'm using it.

I got this because NetFlix was no longer supported on my TV. Works great. I picked up a lot of streaming I didn't have before. Dinged it a star because it has no volume control - have to use the other tuner for that - minor irritation.

I have several fire sticks on other tvs but really wanted to like the Roku when we got it. Unfortunately, something kept going wrong with the HDMI connection so I'd have to unplug the whole device like every 2 or 3 days to reset it. The UI was fine, slightly less straightforward than I was used to, and the remote worked well but needed line of sight to the Roku, unlike the fire stick. Overall, I wouldn't but this again...
I do not recommend this Roku the one I bought quit working one week after the return window closed it started making a high-pitched whining noise and would not load up past the Roku screen.

Works great, except it keeps needing the hdmi to be unplugged and plugged back in for some screen pops up telling me that and while it plays it's just a screen saying unplug , turn off the tv and roku and start again.

It worked for about 4 days and then wouldn't connect to my wireless.  I found out I had cancer about then and had surgery.  I'm still recovering from surgery but am just able to deal with this only to find out it's too late to return it.  I feel supremely ripped off.  Roku is junk.
We have 5 of the roku’s one out of 5 the remotes kept dying and defective. Kept buying remotes and they were all defective. Finally bought new stick with remote and so far it has been working great!

Unlike my Roku stick which refused to respond to its remote, this one does. It's also IR, so the Roku has to be in the line of sight, but that's no problem. This model is not 4K, but again, neither is my TV.
I bought this for my mom since she wanted to cut her cable. She's not super tech savvy and she found it easy to use. She gets all her shows thanks to the all the family streaming acounts!

I have an older 70” Vizio tv that Netflix app no longer worked. Connecting Roku to tv was so easy and I can now view Hulu and Netflix and all the other available options. Great purchase, in fact I bought another one for tv in my office as well.

I bought this Roku unit after my brother lost my controller to the unit I had loaned him (to show him what Roku is like).  Easy to install and use.  It comes with all the cable and remote controller.  I love Roku!
I have two and needed one more and it works great.
This replaced the Firestick that went out. It costs half of what the Firestick costs. I like it better. I will be buying two more and getting rid of three cable boxes and saving money.

This is really a great value.  It is so easy to set up, and I can get frustrated with today's technologies.  No issues here, really enjoying this and broadcast (purchased an antenna) instead of cable.

Love this product. I’ve used a gaming system for so long. It took up so much room. This is easy to use and user friendly (my 6 yr old can navigate it super well). It was easy to install, get everything loaded and logged into.

I can't believe I didn't get one of these little guys sooner!! Really easy to install and use! Has all my movie apps, including Disney + and Redbox! 5 star quality for very little money LOVE LOVE LOVE!
Turned an old flat screen tv into a fun device in my kids room.  The apps work great for Netflix, Disney +, Spectrum, Amazon Prime....took my old TV from 2008 and turned it into something from2020.
After a couple of months using it stopped working, the device is not able to connect to the internet and for instance is worthless. Nobody is giving me an answer in what to do or how to replace it.

Ok I also have a stick. Stick is way better at pulling up what you need quickly.I ordered this for the summer .The stick overheats all summer .Sooo annoying. This doesn't over heat. Just ignorant at times

I don't have to sell you on how good Netflix Prime and Hulu are. But having them all on a TV that hasn't been used in years is amazing and life-changing. Not having to watch on a tiny tablet is awesome.

Plug it in. Login to wifi. Select apps. Login and watch on my accounts with Netflix, Apple TV, and Hulu. I also love the free PlutoTV. Too much to watch now! Quality product and solid apps! Can't believe it's only $25.

I got it so I could watch Blaze TV on my TV instead of computer.  I think I'm going to like it for many other things.  I can access the Spectrum App on older Smart TV but like the navigation on Roku better.I did not have to pay an activation fee when setting it up online.  You don't have to enter a credit card either.
