I mostly use this to watch Plex, Netflix, Hulu, and youtube. Does the job just fine with no more delay than I would expect. Bought a few for my mom since I liked them so much.

This is our second Roku. We bought it for our living room. We bought it to update our tv to be able to use Disney+ and Hulu also so my son could turn the tv on his own since we don’t have another remote for that tv. The remote does not have a power button or volume control and that is the main reason we bought it
I had an Amazon fire stick and didn’t think I would like Roku. I think I like it even better. They offer different things so I have them on different tv’s. Glad I got this one!
I love my new Roku.  It was so easy to set up and use. I have the roku 2 and 3 and this new one is much smaller but packed with everything I need for streaming my favorite programs and channels.

Love my Roku! I'm able to download almost anything. With this Roku you can watch Disney Plus, (why I got it) Netflix, YouTube, Sling, Hulu, Prime Video, ESPN, and many more. The Roku is quick and easy to set up, and if you lose your Roku controller there is an app that allows you to use your smart phone as a controller. Every once in a while the picture is a little grainy, but if you exit the show app and go back in that usually fixes the problem within a couple minutes. I definitely recommend!

At this point, there’s really no reason NOT to have a Roku for every tv. Bought this for the tv and now the house is complete. No room without Roku!  Great selection of apps & love the addition of the Roku tips & tricks app.

Replacing my older Roku2 that I’ve had for 10 years now and still worked fine but couldn’t get Disney+ on it. This one does! And it’s smaller, works well with my older tv. My original purchase has served me well and so has this one
Easy to install. Only downfall was that the remote doesn’t have a volume button on it. It does connect to a smartphone so you can use your phone as a remote if you lose your remote temporarily.

Nice low profile device with lots of channels. All you need is wi-fi internet and you are all set. The device responds very nicely to the remote. Cheaper than paying for cable. It has a good amount of free apps and channels in addition to subscription apps.
This does the job of getting you streaming channel access, Netflix, amazon, etc for a fraction of a cost of what other devices cost.  Cheaply made is the only draw back.

I love the Roku Express - I have one for each of my TVs and use them all the time as I do not like regular TV programing.  Roku has a great variety of channels to choose from and it is very easy to set up.

We have bought several of these since November 2019 and the first one has now stopped working...not happy with that. Our other TVs are working but this one just stopped for no known reason. We don’t like being without Roku!

Have to use one credit card to start, otherwise, apps cannot be used. Though, you will not get charge without your permission for purchasing or renting a movie.But, its great! It works perfectly. Nice to have.

Read alot of reviews and plenty said dont pay to have install help. Not sure what that was about it never even asked for money. It was super quick too longest to enter passwords for all of are subscriptions. Worth it to us.

The problem with this is I do not know who designed this product but he should be FIRED. It has a long and hard setup which requires you to create a Roku account and have a phone or a computer in order to complete it. I just wanted a hassle-free product, something with easy set up, connect to WIFI without using a phone and that is it, done but this is NOT the case, it took my 2 hours to complete the setup. Once the setup is completed, the product is good.
Works great! It’s the best deal I found for a streaming media player that goes up to 1080 (not 4K). Plugs into the tv easily and is easy to use with the remote or the app.

I didn't realize that there isn't an on or off button on this like my other remote. Also no volume control like my other remote. Not happy about this at all. I still have to keep my other remote to turn TV off. Or buy another, universal for all. Otherwise, it's the same as my other Roku.

Bought it to replace a hand-me-down Apple TV that was having problems. Easy to set up. Only thing that would make it better is if the shortcut buttons on the remote were programmable to the things I use most.
Same product in store, better value.  Needed to for a smart tv that wouldn't allow us to add the apps we wanted.Not the remote that features volume buttons

Purchased this Roku device to replace our first-generation Chromecast. We are most satisfied with our purchase. From my vantage point, Roku offers the same (if not better) features as the AppleTV, but at a much more reasonable price.If you don't have a smart TV and you are looking for a streaming device, get this.

It occasionally decides not to connect to the wireless, even when the signal is perfect and all other devices in the same location are connecting to the wirelessly perfectly. No matter what I do - restart the Roku, reconnect to wireless, unplug the Roku, restart the modem, unplug the modem -  nothing helps. Returning it!

Esta excelente cumple con su función, es económico y certificado para Netflix. Su interfaz es rápida y organizada. Tiene buena potencia, vale la pena. Y tiene mas modelos, si los buscas son mejores. Este dispositivo es una alternativa muy buena, si no tienes Smart TV y no tienes o no quieres gastar tanto dinero. Llevo tres meses usándolo y no he tenido ningún problema.Nota: Trae sus baterías para el control y un cable HDMI.
Really love my Roku. Due to the cable we have my Fire stick was not compatible with it so I had to get the Roku. Great Roku channel. East to use and install.

This product is easy to set up and use.  The only problem is the signal cuts out frequently and then flutters back in and out, so there is no consistent reception, a problem I have not had with any other wifi device.
it works great but it wont do casting from your phone. If you want to cast your own videos or from different movie sites like chrome cast does it wont do it. It will only cast from roku its self
We have 2 other Roku machines. We love them. This one has a remote that does not have a power button to turn the TV on. It also has quick access buttons, but not for the streaming services we own.
Recvd mine yesterday. Setup not to bad. Saves no information. Have to use keypad for each channel, annoying. Most aggravating, having to disconnect to return to regular tv stations.

It's faster than my old Roku LT and the picture is good. The only problem I'm having is that the WiFi receiver seems not as sensitive as my old Roku LT, so it frequently loses contact with my WiFi router.

Have Wi-Fi and you're sick of paying cable why don't you get a Roku it's the best thing for you you can get free channels you get free TV it's awesome number one recommended fire stick is worse I don't like the fire stick I recommend the Roku stick number one top no complaints no problems easy to set up easy to learn anybody can do it even a 99 year old woman did it anybody can do it
I have another roku device and I bought this for someone else. The only thing I don’t like about this one is the Infrared so you have to point the remote at the device. Other than that it works great
I bought this and it was hard to set up. It interfered with other electronics. I ended up not using it, but since I had set it up, I couldn't send it back. It may have worked great, just not for me.

Love My Roku! Best $ I spent of 2019! Should of got this long time ago! Got it cuz I dont have a cable box in my room so I use the Xfinty App this way I can watch anything now in my bedroom! Deff recommend!

can be laggy and buffer, but of course those are internet problems. have to use another remote for the volume and power the tv on/off. but other than that, it’s great. actually easy to setup, unfortunately i had to disconnect my nintendo switch dock cable. i sometimes keep having to move my remote in order for it to work, because of the sensor but i use the roku app so it’s good
The ROKU has become a necessity for many people to be able to see video / TV programming. Our family included.  I have bought this device for our family and to give as a gift.

I have a lot of Roku boxes and very happy with them. I bought this one to pack in bag for traveling. I use it to connect to tv in hotel rooms. Gives me more options of what I can watch then what hotels supply
I have a fire stick in my living room so I wanted to try something different in the bedroom.  This device is fantastic. Great picture quality and it gives me some new things to watch.  Great value!

I bought the Roku Express a few months ago. It freezes and restarts almost every single time I try to watch something. It takes about 5 minutes to cycle. Then it’s fine.  I recently asked my sister about hers and she says it never happens anymore, but her old one had the same problem.  It seems like some have this defect.
Had to get this so I could get Disney + for my grandson.  Its fantastic!! Easy to install and set up and run. Even my grandson (3.5 years old) can maneuver his way around with the simple remote!
I have had a Roku Express for almost a year and love it. I bought 2 to give as Christmas gifts and the people I gave them to love them too. It's so easy to set up and very user friendly.
Excellent roku for spare bedroom. Easy to hook up.  The only reason I took a star off is because there is no volume control.  I guess I missed that in the description.  But still works great.

Apple TV stopped working on it. One of the main reasons I bought it. Neither RoKu or Apple could help. But the rest of the Apps are great and I am learning more everyday. Awesome if you are ready to dump cable!
Very easy to set up and use,  free channels and negotiated subscriptions such as Disney+ Come with it and my kids love  Disney+ at $70 per year and I will keep it at end of 7 day trial.

For the price, this is awesome!I’ve been without cable and internet for almost 10years due to not wanting to spend the extra cash and since quarantine I am glad I did! The only negative is the kids are my main watchers, I wish the cartoons continually played through episodes Although, I would like to try the premium (maybe that’s a perk there) this one is still great for the basics
This is good for the price. It is being used in my son's room. He seems to like it pretty well. I might get a more expensive version for the a main room, but this is good for a bedroom.

I only gave a low rating on value control because my remote doesn’t have any volume control buttons. I have quite a few Roku devices in my home and all of the others do have that option. I still love the product regardless
This is worse than the Roku 4 it replaced. Freezes more often and will have the loading circle on the screen more often.
Works well so far. It was easy to set up and has a very clear picture. Remote feels like a cheap plastic but it works fine. Good option to add smart tv options to a regular tv

This tool is amazing when it comes to watching movies, downloading apps and enjoying shows with my family. and I am impressed with the fact that I will never have to pay a cable bill ever again. Great product!
I love my roku’s this is my second one it was a different model but they work the same which makes it so easy to plug in and 💥 it works great. I pounder getting at least one more 🤔
Would be decent device but as many others 0020 HDCP error many others have. I am not interested in unplugging all cables every use.. junk
It works great! My only concern with this is that the remote doesn't have volume control button. It will be way better if it did.But overall works Great!

I have purchased three Roku express sticks and had to return all three of them because they would not connect to the Internet. I spent hours on the phone with ROKU support, Linksys support and geek squad only to find out that all three of the products were defective.  I purchased  an Amazon fire stick and set it up today, set up was a breeze and it works perfectly. Don’t waste your time and money on the Roku!
Very happy with product, fast delivery and good price. Easy to install and works great with our TV.

Got this as a gift for the mom in law. She loved it and it came same day super quick I was impressed. Lots of streaming services at your fingertips and pretty much turns any TV to a smart one. Great bang for your buck.

I love this product. I use to stream from my DVD player but it was slow and would often lag in uploads. The Roku was a good price, easy to install and use, uploads quickly and has a huge selection of programming.
Works great as expected. Package was delivered to wrong address by no fault of the company.  Amazon took care of it right away. Company was great in replacing it.  Very happy.
Got this to make my dumb TVs smart. Goal was to get off cable and on to streaming services. Achieved the goal and loving it. One time cost was appealing. Just wish there was a stop button.
It works with a limited mbs.  I had a Fire stick. It buffered continually. I sent it back and ordered the RUKU. Same location same mbs. No buffering. I LOVE IT!!

I put one of these on 3 old tv including on of the original pseudo 1080 tv's.  I am simply amazed at how much more useful these tv's are with the roku express added.  Roku is so much better (and cheaper) than firetv.  I had a firetv stick on one tv which i am discarding in favor of a roku box.
We love this.  After Spectrum kept raising prices we decided to go this route.  My husband is getting use to it and liking it, missing some things from Spectrum.  Not the price.
Bought this impulsively for a movie night. Easy set up, good amount of options are available for streaming services. Feels like you get a lot of value for the price of the item.

There is no volume control as stated but if you’re familiar with Roku most remotes do not! But this one definitely works better than the one that I just bought at Sam’s club and is a newer model than on the shelf at the stores!
Have had NOTHING but problems since purchasing. Wound up buying smart TVs to replace.  Won't stay connected to WiFi, Keeps CRASHING MY WIFI.  Can't return or exchange for new just after 1 month.
Save your money unless you are very tech savy. It says it is easy to install. Not true. After an hour with technical support still didn't get it installed. Only good for the garbage heap!

Get this product super easy set up took maybe 20-30 min to create my ROKU account and sign in to my Hulu Netflix Apple TV and spectrum account. Way cheaper than Apple TV box and other similar products don’t bother with hdmi adapters just get this product 5 stars for sure comes with everything but the WiFi

For years I thought of getting Roku but was very hesitant. When my DirecTV bill went through the roof and my service became unbearable I got Roku and what the heck was I paying for, honestly I have so many channels that no one in the house has had to watch anything twice and ALL those infomercials are gone
Not bad if you dont mind having to factory reset every few weeks which involves having to relog back into accounts. Takes a full evening about every 2-3 weeks.

So far, so good. The device works well. My only complaint is that it keeps taking me back to the menu page at the mistvrandim times and keeps asking me if I am still watching. If I turn on my TV, after a few minutes it will ask me if I am still watching. Leave it the room, come back, and I will be back on the menu page. That is very annoying.
Amazing how easy to install and use. Like that you can recieve so many different channels the best being U Tube. Didnt know about all the things they offer like all the music they offer.

When on a menu screen the roku outputs a buzzing noise over hdmi that comes out of the TV speakers. Can mute the TV every time on a menu and unmute to actually watch a movie, but it's really annoying.
Had to throw away my fire stick because i had so much difficulty with it. It was worthless! Got the Roku and everything works like a charm! So happy it wasn’t my tv.

Decent price and easy to use. My main reason for buying it was because I read that it supported the Xfinity Stream app. It will only support the beta version, which will not allow you to watch the local channels in the line up.
A basic Roku box, which works fine in a system, connected to a projector.  Easy to use interface and remote, connects easily with wifi, and consistent streaming function.
I own an Amazon Firestick and the Roku is just as easy to use. I’m not sure if I like one better than the other they both do similar things. I guess it’s personal preference

I received this product today and tried to set up. I could not even get past the set up screen. We don't have any trouble connecting to the internet with any other device, it is not the internet, the router, the modem, or the password i am entering. However, it keeps telling me it can't connect. This device has to be defective. Now, after wasting my time troubleshooting, i have to take a trip to UPS to send it back. This has been a very frustrating experience, and a big waste of time and money.
This would be a great little device if the audio worked.  I have done everything I can think of to troubleshoot it, but cannot get the audio to work.  I recommend passing on this device.
This Roku express is 2.4 gHz only.  Want all of mine on the 5 gHz band.

The Roku was extremely easy to set up.  The picture on Netflix, Amazon Prime, etc. is crystal clear.  I have had some issues with streaming live shows on the Spectrum App, but I think it is due to Spectrum and not the Roku.
Roku platform is slow but is great for turning an old flat screen into a streaming device using wifi. Most used apps are preinstalled when you turn it on. Would buy again.
I love this Roku! Set up was easy. The picture looks great. I don’t have a smart TV but now it feels like I do with this Roku. I can even push to TV with my phone through the Roku. Great product!

We have really enjoyed the Ruko. It has great visuals and is super easy to use. I love how many channels/apps it has available and that we can easily customize our homepage with the apps we use regularly.  It has been worth every penny, and at a great price point.  My only regret is that it took me so long to purchase!
Excellent item. Easy to install, apps work great, and supreme picture quality. If your smart TV doesn’t come with ROKU pre-installed this item is worth the additional investment.
muy bueno recomendado
I have a smart TV that only likes to work about half of the time, so I got this to make things easier. I'll get more apps through this and def take advantage of some free trials!
Really like Roku better than fire stick. Less expensive and easier to use. Works perfectly and compatible with Disney + Apple TV YouTube tv etc

Bought this to put on my grandparents TV. Since they can't leave the house, they have needed something to keep them occupied and entertained. It was easy for me to set up, and they understand how to use it immediately. Perfect for older people who need something to help them through this time. They are very happy with it, and I'm happy with it.

My daughter was the only one who didn't need a new tv. So the televisions that we purchased had Roku installed in them. She was jealous cuz she couldn't watch everything her sissy was able to. Luckily I found this and ordered it, and now problem solved. Our baby girl is very content and we didn't have to purchase another television!!!
We bought this to use on a TV that was being used to replace our daughters broken Roku TV. Easy install and set up. No complaints what do ever. 😁
we have been using roku for a few months, we added hulu and disney+we have not cut the tv strings yet, but i think we are about too.
I've been streaming everything through my blue-ray player so I finally got into this century and purchased the Roku.  It's works great and I'm very glad I purchased it.
I loved the new roku that I bought and installed two weeks ago. Yesterday Apr. 15 it stopped working altogether.!! Now what am I supposed to do??
Had to replace older Roku model that was EOL and no longer supported - another ROKU gotcha. Any way this works fine I have a 2018 model too and they are comparable.Use for Hulu, AMZ, Xfinity, Tablo
Works amazing well with my television. Easy to hook up! Doesn’t have volume button on remote I have to use tv remotes. Can even use it to stream Xfinity channels. Works like a charm. Great buy!
When I tried to listen with headset and iPhone, the picture and words were out of sync. One of the main reasons I purchased this item was to use headset. Sad....

I formerly purchased a Roku for a lot more money.  I needed another for an additional TV that had no streaming and found this one for $29.99.  Great deal, works just the same.  Easy to install, does everything I wanted it to.
It worked well the first few times of use. Now, after a commercial comes up on Hulu, the screen freezes. I've already taken the restart steps and the issue is ongoing.
I wish the remote had numbers! When I'm using this to watch my cable provider app, I can't just change the channel. You have to scroll a d its tediously time consuming.
This is a bait and switch. They claim no activation fee, they just charge $90 to "register on their platform" which is undisclosed
Perfect! We have 3!This was delivered in June. Today the center button (purple) came off in 2 pieces with glue underneath.

One of the the 3 ROKU Express's is giving us an issue that we cannot figure out.  And apparently because we purchased the "Express" version, we are not eligible for phone support? REALLY ROKU? We have troubleshooted everything we can possibly think of, nothing has worked!Also, to anyone out there that would like to connect a Blue Device, I.E. speaker, do not purchase Roku Express - it has NO BLUETOOTH CAPABILITY.....which we do not know when purchasing.  I guess we did not do our homework!
I love this gadget, having had an old one for about 6 years. Had to upgrade and saved the shipping costs by using my Prime to get it. Very happy with the purchase!

The cords are really short, and if your TV is a bit weird, there's no obvious way to correct the aspect ratio, so you end up missing like 4 inches of a menu on all sides.Other than that though, it was very easy to set up and my previous experiences with Roku have been very positive.  I just wish I could navigate Youtube, but the entire side bar is in that invisible no mans land.  :)
Good for streaming services, only thing is that the app store is kind of limited. You have to register on their page, and for some apps you have to  actually pay see the channels or streaming.

I purchased this Roku Express for our 2005 TV in our spare bedroom. I wasn’t sure if it will work with our old TV. It worked really well without any problems. It was very easy to install, no complicated instructions. I’m also surprised at the clarity considering our TV is old. But best of all, is the savings we got for not using cable. I paid $25.00 for this Roku Express here on Amazon, it was such a good price.
El video que muestran es incompleto. Al conectar el roku aparece un código que no funciona. Y piden comunicarse a un número donde hay que pagar $79.99 para activar el roku. Es una venta desleal
totally worth it. I love how cheap it is. I love how easy it is to set up. I love how its linked to my amazon account and this isn't even a promoted review lol.
For the bandwidth that I have, the two that I have are the perfect fit.  Easy to set up, lots of choices both free and subscription, much quicker than my original Roku HD that was 10+ years old.
I got this as a birthday gift and use it in my craft room.  It allows me to access movies on multiple sites which I love.  It's easy to use and I highly recommend it.

This basic model works fine for my child and her older tv. She was able to use a converter, the Roku stick and a few cords to set up a “smart TV.” No more extra charges from Xfinity! Even though  Xfinity now owns Hulu
So much better then my Firestick, wow I can still bring up my Starz and my HBO without having to go through a seperate membership! ROKU is awesome!
Easy to install. Remote needs to be labeled on each button, can be a little confusing to learn. Would be nice to be able to turn TV on and off with Roku remote instead of having to use 2 remotes.
Easy hookup,  easy online registration,  easy setup. Works great on our older 1080P TV.  Excellent streaming on 2.4 wifi.Only draw back it couldn't find our 5G wifi.

It's absolutely perfect for my dorm! It is so easy to use, you literally just plug it in and it's ready to go! It's so portable and I can't wait to take it with me to hotels later on this summer! There is no set up fee. The picture quality is amazing and I am excited to see if it actually pairs with my new Alexa Echo. Overall, so happy with my purchase, plus I love all the free movies and tv shows that come with it.
Works great on my basement tv. Now wife can stream her work out videos and I can work and watch shoes and such with no problems with sound or video.
Needed a dedicated streamer to use with my digital only Spectrum service.  After creating Roku account and  installing Spectrum app, I couldn't be more pleased with the results..
I was very sceptical,  lottery took minutes to hook up and start streaming.  Very impressed with picture quality and ease of use. Highly recommend this product.
No audio won't size to the screen won't scroll the menus  no TV is better than having to deal with Roku I'm totally disgusted with it oh and BTW the help is no help

The Roku device gives quick access to tv channels and streaming tv service. Setting up channels to recognize a streaming tv service took extended time to do. Once in place, it gives quick and easy access to the streaming service. The Roku channels are quick to reach.
Works great especially for people who cut the cord. I used it with Sling, Netflix, and Prime. So easy to install and works great. I got an additional one for my bedroom.
We love roku! We have 3 in our house, and absolutely love how whatever I download on 1 shows up on all 3! My kids love that you can change the background and screensaver!

Purchased this Roku specifically for YouTube streaming and it freezes and crashes everytime I try to open the app. Customer support was worthless when it came to troubleshooting and I tried all the 'fixit' ideas online. Will have to return this and find a better streaming alternative.

The Roku was very easy to set up.  There were several steps but none were technically demanding, register a Roku account, etc.  The only problems we've encountered have been related to out rural location and the Verizon Internet.
Love this product. Specially the parental controls. With my IPhone I can sync it, and choose what i can download quicker, the remote control. All of it is great!

I would definitely recommend roku it's great and easy to set up. I didn't have to pay for anything to set it up as I noticed in some reviews. You only pay for what you want. I use it for Netflix, hulu and prime video and I love that it offers free tv channels as well.

No volume control. No power on/off control. Simple features that put the Roku miles behind the Firestick. Can’t handle two remotes for every tv in the house.Hooked the Roku up, noticed the tv control features were not present, ordered a firestick, boxed up the Roku next day.

We have connected the Roku and continue to get a HDCP error where there is sound but no picture on our TV with the device. We have troubleshooted the error and researched online and have not been able to connect with visual.  We finally called Roku customer service and they wanted $69.99 to help us fix the issue on a brand new device.  No thanks, Roku, we will be getting a fire stick instead.  So much for any sort of customer service from their company.
Easy to set up. Easy to use.  Tons of free programming. I like that it is so small. I powered it with the TV USB and used double sided tape to stick it to the TV. Very inconspicuous.
Easy to set up and use.  I got a second one for when we go on vacation to plug into the TV and keep watching our shows.  Works great and would recommend this.
They forgot to mention addirional, non refundable charge to start account. No voice control, no complete search, have to go app by app. Ridiculous.
I’m all about the Roku now... way better than any fire sticks I’ve had

This worked abt 1 mth & now i have so many problems.....just yesterday all by its self changed guide & takes forever to change a channel.....constantly gets STUCK & I can go on & onMy opinion WASTE OF MONEY/SORRY I BOUGHT

Warning this does not support 5ghz speed from your modem you will be forced to use the slower 2.5ghz speed. I have no idea why they set it up like this. Additionally they don’t even clearly state this in the features. Do your research I think there are other roku devices that do support 5ghz.
It was easy to install. Just make sure you have your laptop or iPad nearby as you need to put in codes they provide through your email. Good price & works well!
You cant do scree. Mirroring from iphone.  Only mirror your photos which sucks! I want to stream from the internet.Need to buy a different device

We are in our 80s and we had to get our grandchildren to help us hook it up, but now we can watch Prime videos and also Living Scriptures.  We haven't explored to see what else it can do, but that is enough for us now.  We are very happpy with it.

This thing has a very serious glitch regarding its WiFi connectivity. Extremely unstable, stops working altogether after about 30 minutes (overheats?) and can become extremely frustrating.Do not spend you hard earned money on this device.
This was to replace our 2015 Roku stick. Much improved version. Faster. Better picture. Super happy with the new version. Super glad we replaced our 1st one.

Would not connect on the device I needed it to. Interface directions where easy to follow along with the online help center. Unfortunately, it would not work on my Westinghouse TV. I just hooked it up to my kitchen TV. Simple to install and hook up.
Was easy to set up. Works great. We. Only got it because the Netflix on our smart tv will no longer be supported as of December 1st. But now that we have it we like it a lot better
We have 2 Roku TVs in the house and recently decided to cut the cords and go with full streaming services, so we bought this device for our non-roku TV. It's perfect!

Which requires unplugging HDMI cable or also power cable :/ Remote sucks too, my previous one was over WiFi. Overall I don't see any improvement comparing with my old Roku USB stick that's few years older.
This is the 4th Roku I've purchased- we have 4 TV's and all are now on WiFi. They all have worked flawlessly over the past year. I can't believe we stuck to cable as long as we did.

We purchased this to replace our old Roku (one of the very first models). I loved how small it was, and how you could mount it to the television. This is an excellent replacement. But beware the cords aren't that long so be careful where you mount it on your television.
It sucks, it took a long time to get connected to the internet, after been connected it keep on losing the internet connection, where I have to reset it every time.

The site shows the remote with a Disney plus button, one of the reasons I ordered this one.  *No Disney plus button.  I got ESPN, Netflix, Hulu, and something else I don't even remember.  So now I'm returning since I don't use any of those.
I have the other one and now I have this one. It is so awesome to be able to go into other rooms and watch movies on the Roku devices just like Apple TV
Super easy to set up and start streaming. Picture quality good, no pixelation or buffering! Highly recommended if you have a basic TV without 4K image or Smart settings
Works great. I didn't realize this unit remote is out of date. There are no power or volume control on this remote. The newer model Roku has the better remote control.
Everything said about Roku Express in the Amazon listing is accurate. Bought two and found them easy to install and that they do a fine job.
Love my Roku!  SO many channels, and many are free.  Plus you get to try out a lot of the pay channels for a free week or even a few months.
Inexpensive but still an HD output/picture. Didn't need all the extras as my TV isn't 4k.If all you do is watch the basics, this is perfect.
We have very fast internet, over 150Mbs. This hunk of junk keeps buffering, then stops showing the show being watched. Then it resets. True crap, don't buy!!!
There’s nothing I can say negative about this it’s a great way to escape the high cost of cable television has everything you could want when it comes to popular networks.

Terrible! I haven't been able to watch a single show straight through without the thing freezing up, stopping, or playing audio without video. I tried Hulu, Netflix,  and Amazon just to make sure it wasnt an issue  the app. Don't waste your money! I had to buy this because my smart DVD player no longer supported Hulu. I never had these issues with that player, so I know it's not my internet connection.
I purchased for my parents especially with the covid 19 pandemic. Now they are able to watch more programs and movies since we are unable to leave the house.
Needed to use streaming app to cut my Xfinity bill.  This does the trick and it looks great on my TV.
I needed to upgrade my original Roku (because of Disney+ streaming).  This was the perfect solution since I was not replacing our main TV.
Perfect for watching shows through Netflix and Viki, etc.  I also like the free channel app Xumo, it plays over 100+ channels as if flipping through channels on a regular TV subscription.
So easy to setup!!! I would buy again! I highly recommend!! Though I did have a difficult time trying to open the battery compartment on the remote.
Finally baseball season started, but I couldn’t find my Chromecast connector! Ordered this Roku (have two other devices on tvs) and works like a charm
We connected this for the first time last week and it quit working yesterday.A white light flashes and it won't connect.

Works to connect our old Samsung tv to Disney+! Also, fantastic ease of use, set up like Netflix so it’s really easy to use. Fun and easy so far! Also, I love that there’s no cost other than the device.
Bought this for our roommates and it's made their non- smart LG TV just like our TCL Roku Smart TV. Easy setup, no issues. It's a win in my book.
Excellent product! Excellent everything especially price & quality. Took a lot of money off my cable bill by buying ROKU.

I have four of these in our home and have been using them for two years without problems. The Roku units are well made and work as advertised. I find them much less quirky than the Amazon Fire TV stick, which I also own.
Really easy to use and always adding more channels, even those made by smaller independent production companies. Pretty much just plug-and-play.
I love it I turn my older TV version into a smart TV I am able to see pureflix YouTube and more . I am so happy I bought it all you need is an HDMI connection.

I love it. It’s smaller than any other version iPad and with the sticky strip that comes with it I can put it just about anywhere. Remote easy to use. And you can always go online and watch videos on channels that you can get that are not listed on the Roku. All in all I love it and I give it a 10 out of 10.
Dislike this product as doesn’t have the amazon button. Seems small for some but not for the elderly to navigate. Check the buttons to see if it’s items you watch.
Have had this since February but lowkey sucks because it always asks me to unplug and replug it back in.
Bought this for my mom who is terrible with technology. She figured out how to use it pretty quick. Set up was easy and the viewing options seem endless. Great product.
Got for bedroom and didn’t want a extra cable box and the extra money for the cable box. I am loving this easy to install easy to use.
Perfect! Easy to set up, I didn't even need the directions. Great picture quality and allows me to run all of my apps on my non-smart bedroom TV.
I like the way Roku's work. I find it very easy to set up and use. Picture quality is very good. Adding channels is also very easy.
Was disappointed I needed to use credit card to use the device, even though I wasn't purchasing anything from Roku. Cumbersome and unnecessary to enter credit card.
Bought this baby and watched it for a while then I realized I hadnt actually watched my direct tv in months! Definately easy to use, quick and good picture. Smart buy!
Got this for my parents and they love it. Especially the simplicity of the remote. We have 4 in our house. Love the device.This also got to us quickly.
Picture is awesome. Great value and I’m able to watch what I want instead paying for cable tv and paying to watch commercials.Cancelled my Spectrum service next day saved
It is a bargain, tiny and easy to use. Except for not having voice remote the performance is flawless. The best thing is that the device gets its power from the USB port on the TV.

The Roku has ads during programs! My old Roku never had ads. The reason that Roku products are so cheap is that they make A lot of money off the ads. The Apple TV is much more expensive but you don’t get the really annoying ads.
This newer model has Spotify which I love as well as a button for the new Disney plus! It is better and quicker than the older versions . . . A very good deal!

It’s cool when it works—but 90% of the time when we are watching something it cuts out and reloads the Roku back the the home screen. I tried buying a new cable for it as some suggested and it still didn’t work. Don’t waste your money!

I thought I could save a couple of bucks going with this instead of the firestick. It does not control your tv ( volume or power) without the upgraded remote for $15. If you don't mind using multiple remotes I would recommend it other just pay the extra and get a firestick

Lots of free channels. Ability to subscribe to many additional channels at low monthly prices. No contracts. Can cancel any time or just use the many free channels. My Air BNB Guests Love them. They use their own subscriptions and then just sign out when they leave! Awesome! I have 4 of them, currently and will buy more, as needed.

This remote control does not have a power button or a column control. Yo can buy another remote to pair with it. I was foolish and bought two at once. My bad. But bad on amazon for not relating that info clearly in its adds.

My older large screen TV was not a smart TV and ROKU has now given me the ability to access so much streaming content without having to bring my laptop in and connect to the TV every time I want to stream.
Overall, this just works.UI can be a little more streamlined but it streams without any issues.

Does what it's built for. Simple to use, maybe too simple. If I had to complain about something it's it's simplicity.. Or maybe I'm just used to having 25 buttons on my remote that I don't need or know what they do..
Very happy with this. Ordered it for my grandkid's room, and liked it so much I kept it and gave them my firestick.  Great product.
Love it. We cut the cord and use this to stream FUBO tv, netflix, hulo
Worked well right out of the box.  No complaints about picture quality.  The included remote is bare-bones, but gets the job done.
Perfect for my application - I have two; one in the bedroom and the other in the den.  Both work without issues and are truly simple to set up and use.
Why did no one ever tell me to get this years ago! Best thing I ever bought it’s so fun works great!! more things to watch perfect for anyone especially a hermit!
I had to upgrade to get Disney+. I am so glad I did, this Roku works so much more quickly than my old one. I am buying a second one for another room in my house.
Finally the tv at home that needed roku, it's ready to use it. The conection and the instructions very easy to understand. Great item
Easy to set up, easy to connect to my older flat screen TV, it syncs all my Roku channels from my other Roku TV, overall I love it

this roku is amazing and has everything you need! don’t buy anywhere else or a more expensive one. this roku does the job and does it very well. also, THERE IS NO ACTIVATION FEE. just follow the steps  when you activate it and you will be just fine!
We've been streaming media for years. So far, this little dude is far and away the best bang for the buck. The ability to send commands to it over the network is just icing on that cake.

This Roku (my third) , had an issue with the screen freezing at the end of commercials on Hulu. When this occurred, the audio would revert to the program.  Counter acting this required fast forwarding then hitting the play button. All other Roku's have worked perfectly.

I usually buy the Roku sticks that plug into the back of the tv but they are about 60 bucks. I wanted something cheaper since I was only using this out at my parent’s house. This works great, just as good as the Roku sticks!
Their is no other way to put it. This turns your normal flatscreen or whatever tv you have into a smart tv works good does what I need it to do no complaints
I wish I had Roku soon. It is great and much less than my other devices. I’m highly appreciative at the quality and speed of my delivery!
I got an old Samsung, but unable to get it to work, it works on my newer tv. So beware it might not be compatible with all models.
Bought it and it arrived the next day. Installed it on the TV it was simple. Had it up and running in a few minutes. Get product and I’m very happy. Love the Roku.
I should of got one of these a long time ago!! It turns any tv into a msart tv and the roku channel offers a lot of free tv and movies.
Bought this after FINALLY getting high speed internet at home.  Works great for both pay and free streaming.  Easy to set up and use.
I dropped cable for streaming and found the price and features of this Roku to be great.  Happy that I made the switch. Roku is easy to use and mostly trouble-free.
Like the product. Easy to use.  Still figuring a few things out, like how to enter a number for a certain channel instead of scrolling through the whole guide.

Great roku! I have an Element brand TV with an HDMI port and this roku works great. Easy set up & remote comes with batteries. No other payments needed besides the price of the roku when purchased! No subscriptions.
I don’t recommend these only because you Cannot Connect then to your 5G WiFi ... 2G can be too slow sometime. However, the Fire Sticks are about the same price and CAN connect to your 5G
Works great, i had to buy a universal remote not because of anything wrong with this one, i just wanted one to run everything with one remote.

It all hooks up fine, the picture is great and it works. However, the remote has no volume control nor a power button. Therefore you need to use two controls, the Roku control and then the TV control. Honestly, why do this? It's all about saving a few pennies here and there.
Works much better than the Firestick for me.  I own several of these and have had no problems.  I had to return 2 Firesticks that died within the first month.
We love having Roku. This has been great so far! We have 3 of them for different tvs. Great device to have! Picture quality is really good!!
We do not have a smart tv but this easily takes the place and has a very simple and easy to use remote.  Love being able to get internet without buying a new tv.

Had my dad's set up using an Xbox One, but he can't work the controllers very well.The remote seems well made and there isn't any noticeable input lag. My dad only watched movies or TV so this works great for all the subscriptions I have. He's almost 60 and has never been good with technology and says he likes that the buttons are mechanical and have a nice click to them.
We are very impressed with the easy of setup, and had no idea what we were missing. There are so many more free channels than we ever expected.
Cut the cord and went with 2 of these for all our TV needs - these work really well.  Easy to connect, easy to add services and get connected, great picture and sound.
It’s am amazing. I have two all different generations and they all work well. This one is crystal clear, I use it on a HD tv that’s 60 inch
I don’t know what took me so long to order this.  I bought three and it’s the best purchase ever.  Very easy setup too.

I have had only trouble with this device since buying it. It seems to connect to my wireless router once in a while, after restarting 50 times, then after finally connecting, it seems to lose the connection a few days later and can’t connect again. It’s sitting right next to the router too so it’s definitely not signal strength.
Had to return it. It wouldn’t connect to my wireless. Would work for a while then stop. Bought another fire stick. Much better. Never an issue with the fire stick. I have 3.
Should have bought this a long time ago.  Its worth every penny.  Easy to use and gives me so many more apps on my smart tv. And so much more FREE tv and movies.
Only downside I’ve noticed is that if you use the apple+ app, there’s no volume that the device will generate. Might just be a new app thing that they’re working the bugs out on though.
This is my second roku and i love how simple it is to just plug and play. I also like how long it lasts. However i do hate how much my dog likes to eat the remotes. Noooot cool. Lol
I own two of the premium Roku's and fail to see the difference. Now I'm intrigued by that Roku app., can't wait to try it.

There isn't anything FREE about Roko contrary to what the add says. The minimum subscription fee is $70 for 5 years. Nowhere in the product description does it mention a subscription fee. Very misleading the description is littered with the words free. BS, I returned it
We own 4 rokus and they are fast, light weight, really easy to install and use, get it you won’t regret it!! Kids friendly
Bought this to upgrade my HD roku2 which wouldn’t get the Disney+ channel. This one does. It was easy to set up and receives all the channels I want. Great buy.
I just received my roku and I love it. Set up was easy. I’m excited to use. My only wish is that you could change the volume with the remote. But I still like it
since I discontinued my cable network, this roku. allows me to go to my favorite Netflix, Amazon Prime, and other channels.  easy to use.
Easy to set up replacing a ps4 that was used to stream Disney plus. It is easy to edit and purchase entertainment for the family!
Love this works greatOnly complaint isn’t compatible with TVs so can’t turn on tv or volume with one remote
I replaced two older devices (fire stick and apple tv) with two of these and won't be going back. The roku is easy to use and doesn't freeze up like my fire stick used to.
I’ve been using Rokus for almost a decade and I just love the interface and streaming services available. This little unit is no exception and works perfect.
I have used Roku for years. Yesterday I cut the cable and  now only use Roku and a few special streaming apps... all conveniently thru Roku.
I bought this for my sister, it's exactly like the one I have at home.  It arrived quickly, new in box, as promised and works just like it should!

Have tried other streaming devices and enjoy the Roku remote and user interface the most.  This unit is the basic model without 4k output and does experience some lag here and there bc of less ram than other more expensive models but not enough to be a deal breaker.  If you don't need full 4k streaming the price this unit is just right.
Best affordable product to save money long term using basic internet service. Tons of great Chanel and easy to use and set up

LOVE this thing! I wanted to get the Disney + app so I purchased this Roku! Instruction set up was very easy and a breeze! It’s cool too when you download the Roku app on your phone you can control the Chanel’s Incase you lose the remote!

Love our Roku! I love you can get free apps like PBS Kids on there and add all the ones you subscribe to. Setup was super simple. The directions are clear and come right up on the tv screen. Haven't had any problems with lagging, picture quality is great. The remote is small and this one doesn't have a volume control, which isn't a problem for us. Really happy with it.
We lost the remote for our fire stick and the replacement costs as much as a new one. We use sling TV and decided to try the Roku and we love it!
This didn't work for my TV, I returned it and I still haven't seen my refund and it's been over a month. I'm trying to submit a claim but it won't allow me.
I like the sure steady stream and fine picture. I like that I can pick up local channels giving my wife what she wants to see and still cut the cord.
Got rid of satellite after 17 years and replaced with Roku and YouTube TV. Very happy with the decision.My wife doesn't do new tech well, so it was a bit of a learning curve for her.
Works amazing and the new updated one comes with Xfinity streaming wish us cool,  I don't have to pay for an extra box in my room.
Product qiti working just a few days past the the return window. Will not power on at all even with new power cord

This product is awesome. Can turn any t.v. into a smart t.v. Very fast an easy to setup. Only thing is the remote don't have a volume button on it. So make sure you have the originally remote to the t.v. or you can always add the Roko remote downloaded on your cell phone. This app has volume an voice activation on it! Great product!!!
For $29 one-time I now get live tv on my older 1080p tvs with no monthly cable box fees.  What a steal this device is.
Works great for my kiddos room tv !Easy install and affordable.
Great way to watch all kind of stuff, movies, TV shows etc . I would recommend it as I have 3. All work great.
Love this product, I bought a roku tv so this was the natural next step for the other tv that was roku-less.Really impressed with all the apps it has!
This replaced our old Roku we had used for over 8 years. It is a good upgrade and smaller base. Works well! Good Value.

The unit works great but the instructions for closed captions is lacking. There was no direct explanation of how to activate the feature. Nothing on the internet or the Roku site. Finally by accident I located the access but it should not be so difficult.
Fell in love with Roku and had to buy another one for the tv in my bedroom.  Now recommend to everyone who doesn't have a smart tv.  Will never go back to cable!
Purchased a Roku Express for under $30.00. The device fits in the palm of your hand. Remote is the same style and size as the old Roku version.
Happy I finally got one of these! Nice to see PBS and news channels, as well as Kanopy movies on TV screen instead of laptop screen.
very useful little product. handy and easy to use. i do not like it when it gets stuck while trying to use the back button in its remote control.

Unfortunately I am unable to use this because the HDMI cable that came with the roku is faulty. The customer service videos say to try on another TV if all else fails, but I only have one TV. Also, they do not answer the customer service phone number so there is no way to get a hold of a representative.

I've owned about 4 roku devices and this one is mid tier. Very easy and basic roku experience. Easy to install and use. If you're looking for a roku with more features I recommend the streaming stick or this one as an entry level.
FAULTY HDMI cable.  I have two other Rokus, a 2 and a 3.  I had to switch out the HDMI cables to test the Express.  Sure enough it was nonfunctional.

one thing i like about this is its good if you dont have a 4k television also the picture quality is amazing even for apps like the wwe network and cbs all access and funimationow and many other channels

Idk if Roku usually does this. But the usb worked great by itself the first month. I had problems with the remote pretty much right away. But I downloaded the roku app and I used the remote from my phone. But now about 2 months later the roku is constantly shutting down. I can’t even watch tv anymore because it will restart and it’ll just be stuck forever. $30 worth for nothing.

I purchased this specifically for the Disney+ app.  Sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn’t. I’ve noticed after watching one movie, the second movie doesn’t have any sound. This is true for Disney+, Netflix and Amazon. If I use my smart TV, it works fine. Very frustrating.

Used my newly purchased A/V HMDI converter to hook to my RCA CRT TV. Feels like I have a SMART TV.  Make note to plug it into a wall outlet for power. Plugged it into the modem for power and couldn't completely set it up. Direct electrical power is needed.
I’ve bought three of these, they’re great. Sometimes lag, sometimes have to restart but they’ve been lifesavers
Pleased that it came with everything needed to set the ROKU up. Took a few mins. If I can do it you can to, Beautiful picture.
This is my third Roku. It is not fancy, which is fine for me. The remotes are interchangeable and the system is easy to learn. The price is very nice.

Know that you have to give Roku your personal information including billing information such as a credit card number just to be able to use the device.  It was not worth that to me, I don't like being forced to give that information.  I sent it back

Bought to get Frndly TV on my TV. Really wanted to be able to watch the Hallmark channels. Unfortunately, it did not work. Now, that things have slowed down a bit  I wanted to return Product, but am unable.
I bought two of these, the best purchase and price.  We dont even use the DVR recorder on our satellite receiver any more. We just record tv shows on Hulu..

Easy to set up and no issues playing any TV shows, and no activation fees.  Overall we like it.  Our only issue is the remote reception is very poor.  Constantly pushing the button to try to get it to work.  We typically need to get up, walk closer, then it will work and we can go back to the chair and it will continue....until the next time.  I see the Roku stick has "long range" capability.  May try that next.
Works great for streaming. This thing is so super teeny tiny!! It’s cute af. Comes with a little sticky strip so you can stick it to the side of your tv. It’s so little! I love it!

Just what I needed to get me through Social Distancing.Very easy to install... love that it can be controlled from my phone or tablet.  Especially during set-up when I had to log in to all of those accounts, being able to use my tablet keyboard was a big help.

The Roku setup is easy, setting up the accounts was painful. The click rate on the remote takes awhile to move around the keyboard. For some reason their YouTube app has to be linked to my google account, like google accidentally missed this one sliver of my life and neeeeeds to send me adds based on my YouTube history.

This is a great product. I had an older tv that I gave to my teenager. It wasn’t a smart tv and I wasn’t going to pay for another cable box so I got this. She can watch tons of things through various apps. She even watches movies with her siblings now in her room. Easy to install and set up.
Love this upgrade of the Ruko easy to install, picture is great.  I would recommend... in fact I bought come for a gift for my daughter
This is great! We have an older smart TV and the Roku device made it possible to get rid of cable and stream various networks without having to upgrade our tv.
I bought 2 of these.  One in July 2019 and one in November 2019.  They are both dead.  The one I bought in November worked less than 3 months.  No support from Roku.  Stay away!!!
Super easy to set up and use, literally to maybe 5 minutes and I was watching Roku. I love that it is portable and free. Cant wait to get rid of cable.
Got this as Roku has the Spectrum app so I can go wireless and return the cable box which saves $8 a month.  Works great and enjoying the ability to add other apps beyond the Roku channels.
While I truly recommend the Roku products, I would suggest spending a little extra money and purchasing one with a volume control and an on and off control as this one has neither.
I love my Roku.Easy to install. Easy to operate. Easy to download channels. Easy to navigate.
Got a Roku to replace my Fire Stick. Glad I made the switch. The user interphase on the Roku is simply superior and it has more app options available.
I got this for my nephew so he can watch youtube in his room. He is 9 and has no issue navigating. Easy to use for any age

What I disliked about this ROKU is using the remote to "type" in the search box.  However, if you get the ROKU app on your phone, it will give you a keypad for quicker searches.  You must have a ROKU account, it's free.
I preordered this and it came missing an hdmi cable and a cable to plug into the power support to the Roku. Sooo basically no cords at all.. great!
Great for streaming apps and YouTube for the kids. Easy to set up and use. Like the remote feature on the app you can use on your phone.
Bought it for my dad for a retirement gift. He absolutely loves it and it saves him a $120 satellite bill each month!
This product has really save me money on cable it has great picture quality. I just wish the remote had a power and volume button
This is a small, great streaming device, priced right, and works great.  So good that I gave them as Christmas gifts to friends and family.
This item was easy to install and use but it doesn't work well.  It constantly looses the signal and interrupts the shows.
Easy peasy if you don’t have one hurry get one free tv & you can also buy stars, Netflix etc the options are unlimited
Out Amazon Fire Sticks seem to always lag when navigating through it or even first opening it. The Roku is fast and easy to use.
We are very pleased with this product!  This is the 2nd one we've purchased and will eventually get one more.

I recently cut the cord and thought my my "smart" tv's would run the live tv streaming apps but I was wrong. So the choice buy a new tv or find a way to get the programming I wanted and the Roku Streaming Media player was the perfect fit. Easy to setup and works great!! I'm going to buy more for other tv's in my house
I got 2 of these mainly for the launch of Disney+, but have since been blown away by the amount of content that is available to us, both free & paid.
Had to upgrade due to Roku's upcoming old device support drop. Overall the new set-up is nice except shows start before I have finished reading description.
This device is great, efficient not expensive. The user interface is straightforward, the control is very convenient.

Switched to Roku for the easiness of it. My son is learning the remote controls and he has a better time with Roku then the Fire Stick. So we decided to switch all of them out to Roku. Streams better too. Also love the buttons at the bottom for easy access to the apps!
I don't have a "smart" TV in my livingroom so I bought this so that I would be able to enjoy the same programs on that set. One word! Great!!
This roku does not work while.  Our others roku work fine but this one acts like internet signal bad all the time. I even checked with our internet but that is not the issue.

Just as the title implies, if you live outside USA, this product is a waste of money, it is solely focused in the US market. So if you live neither in USA or Canada, you can use it just for netflix or youtube.
Bought two of these. One for my uncle one for my in-laws they work great. What else can I say from a roku product?
Three TV's, three units, what can I say?  They save me a bundle, cheap to buy, and are super easy to setup.
Even after getting support on the issue I could never get it to interface with my smart tv.  it just kept going around and around on the getting the code and picture quality settings right issues.
As always, these are great! I bought 3 altogether and they’re so handy! Delayed delivery, but it’s worth it!
I have one of these on every TV in my house! Inexpensive, easy to install, and expands your viewing possibilities enormously.
I mainly use it for spectrum app and Disney +... Activation is free and set up is very easy. I love you can stick the box under you TV with adhesive included.
Arrived faster than expected and packaged very well. Easy setup and all sorts of information. Amazon is number 1 for my go-to shopping needs!!

So easy to set up - plug and play!!  Our Apple TV was outdated and we couldn’t download all apps- so I was forced to choose between appletv and Roku and I am so glad I didn’t get swayed just because I have apple everything else... I can still mirror my phone and play to the tv, but for streaming I just like ROKU better- and now we have 2 of them.

I have been using Roku products for a long time. When I connected this one it didn't seem to work quite right.I contacted your support people and they took care of the problem. It was the first time I used the support on Amazon. You are doing a great job of marketing.
Got this after cutting the cord, the best purchases I could have made. So many options/channels to use and choose from.
Nice compact design which sticks to the side or bottom of the tv.  Very good wifi capability and setup is fairly easy.  Great streaming performance.
Works great but for some reason has difficulty using my WiFi. It recommends 2.4ghz which I have but doesn’t like to stay connected.

It's great for Hulu! But when I try to use YouTube it freezes or loads indefinitely after like two songs/videos. Or even when I try to load YouTube it tries to load for like 30 seconds then goes back to the home screen. Please help!
Product is great. The remote doesn't work very well unless it's pointed directly at the roku a few feet away. The app is much easier to use.
Don't know why I didnt switch sooner.Easy setup better picture. My whole family loves it.
Fabulous! Don’t know how I survived without this!! We ended up getting 3 of them and they are perfect to take on vacation! Just need WiFi and an HDMI port
Love love love Roku!It’s clear, Easy to work with additional channels what can I say. Get it it’s worth it
Doesn’t have a volume button so no clue how I can turn the tv up and down without getting up to do so smh
This Roku is great. Very inexpensive but everything you need. It gets a lot of channels, with great clarity. Good purchase!
Absolutely very satisfied with this product. Very well worth the money. So many channels for free.
Cheap!! spend money for upgrade ...there's no volume control or power off button poorly made malfunctions all the time

I tried to activate the second roku device to my existing account, which i read in the procedure, would not be charged, any fees. The representative said I could not because of some kind of security risks had been discovered recently and I would have to pay 100.00 to activate my account. I said I could not do this. I wasn't convinced this to be true. I sent this roku device back to Amazon for credit.
I love these so brought 4. They were Christmas gifts for my daughter and her twins and 1 for myself. Don't know why I could only  order 3 at a time. Had to make a separate one for myself.
Great for bedroom TV. Easy to set up.Can continue to watch a show  that haven't finished that I was watching on my Roku TV.

Came quickly. We were waiting for the newer version to be released. It was fairly easy to set up on my Vizio tv.  We have spectrum and this eliminated the need for a cable box. Seems to be working fine, so far.

Pros: easy connectivity/ installation. Fast quick and simple. Access entertainment in a matter of minutes. Cons: absolutely none. If you haven’t experienced show series and movies through third party apps you absolutely must try it. It’s a game changer. Roku makes it super simple for non technical folks like me.
Needs a larger size remote. Kind of hard for older people to handle. Other than that it is  good.
I now have 3 roku players. I can look at my favorite roku channels at three different locations in my house. I like it.
preorder shipping was on schedule as advertised. The unit works great and is pretty simple to get installed. Also, works great using the Harmony 650 remote.
Wow! Lost of content!I was pleased with all the channels I have access to!
Works great with my not-so-smart LG TV. LG is limited on the apps available to download and this is the perfect solution to that annoying problem.
I have several roku's I did not realize that this particular remote does not have a on off button  or a volume button

I bought this new Roku Express 2019 to upgrade from an older Roku player, thinking it would be even better, but had to send it back. It took forever to load, stuff, it kept rebooting and restarting in the middle of movies, kept losing the Wi-Fi signal, although all my other devices stayed connected just fine. Picture was fuzzy and not clear. Went back to my older Roku player, and have no problems with it.
Functions well with the channels that I stream.  Very nice price for a usable streaming platform.
We have an older model non-smart tv. Works great. Easy set up. Love that the remote is not Alexa enabled.
A little slow, but does the job...If you’re looking for a little quick response you might want to get a new were version of ROKU...
I wish you could change the volume of the tv with your roku remote but besides that’s it’s perfect, no activation fees, no purchases required, and all of my already paid for services in one place

Great product and easy setup, but need to improve the remote.  I like the sleek design, but this one doesn't have volume controls...and the shortcut buttons should be updated to include Amazon Prime Video (or be programmable).
I received free Apple TV for a year with purchase of computer. Ordered this as it claimed to support it. NOTHad to return
It's a Roku. Nuff said.  I only recently began enjoying the Roku channel.  A lot to choose from.  Easy setup and using it is a snap
I am 65 year old and not technical at all but was able to set up and start using it immediately.
Easy to install. User friendly UI. Lots of nice features  Bought it for my grandma and she uses it like a pro.
This is an awesome way to cut the cord.  As long as you have internet and wifi then you can view many paid or free aps for your tv.
They really need to include a remote with volume buttons.  I had to buy a separate remote to use with it.
We purchased a Roku in the past much better than fire stick very little buffering easy accessible to all apps works fantastic with spectrum
Why didn’t I think of this sooner! Easy set up and amazing quality at a awesome price! Don’t wait to get this!!! Oh, and way more channels than basic television; everything u want on one device!

My parents have been loving this. They're older and not good with technology. I originally showed them how to use my PS4 in order to stream shows, but it was too complicated for them so they rarely did. But Roku makes it so easy, they've been watching so much Netflix now!

I should have purchased this device long ago. Easy to set up, with great user interface which I could install and get it up and running in minutes.I now have the capability to stream video at pleasure.
My computer I used for streaming broke down so I bought this and it's great. Installation took no time at all and was very easy. It streams all my services without problem.
Great product! We wish the volume was on the remote but it just doesnt work like that! We love our remote!
Super easy to set up! Perfect streaming device. Great picture! I put this in my kids room with their tv.
If you’re on the fence about getting one of these for streaming I would suggest taking my advice and buying one. It’s worth trying.
This is our second one in the house...plug in and go! Lots of Features and optionsFor free
This roku has the same interface as my roku stick but the remote is basic. It doesn't have a power button, volume controls or voice search.

Roku has found some apps my Firestick did not, I'm comparing the two to decide which to use in our house at many TVs.  Easy to set up, easy to operate, tons of apps and many I could not find on other devices.  Not distracting by the tv set either.
Replaced my old Roku to get Disney + for the showing of Hamilton on July 3. Came on July 1 -easy setup. GREAT !!
the roku device has been a great addition to the video devices and programming. although it does get hot it's operation has been fine.
This is my third Roku I have bought. I have one set up to every tv in my house. Easy to set up an easy to use.
I use it in my rv with my cell phone data. Works great! I like that it has a smaller design/profile than my older Roku’s
Great for travel and staying in an Airbnb or even a hotel it’s not a smart TV. It’s on my favorite stations easy to set up and use
Much easier to add channels than other devices I have.  Highly recommended for its easy setup and user interface.
We had been using the Wii and DVD interfaces to stream Netflix. The DVD went obsolete and the Wii is also awkward. This is a great update for those and more.
Easy to set up. Picture is amazing. Easy to set up smartphone to work with it. You can listen with headphones through your smartphone.  Love it!
Have a roku smart tv downstairs. xfinity app wasn't working well with firestick. this roku is more user friendly for xfinity app.
This one had issues of overheating and then the remote works when it wants even after putting fresh batteries in
This item is an excellent product for the money. Its easy to use and the remote is much better than the first version. It is easier to set up, as well.
Bought this for my mom.  Easy to set up and video shows how to use the Roku.  Vast amount of apps pre loaded and available. Cost effective alternative to cable!

We cut the cord after many years of faithfully subscribing to cable tv. Really worth it. It's just like cable tv except much cheaper. Roku channel offers some free programming. We subscribed to Sling and another channel. It would be nice if the Roku remote had volume buttons and a mute button. I think the more expensive versions of Roku have these features. Still worth it.
Works great with your Amazon Prime video and Netflix as well as 100s of channels. Worth buying I wish I had known about this sooner!
Do user interface is easy to use easy to set upGreat upgrade for my old Roku Express
Gift for parents and they love it. The ease of use and setup was a plus. I love the customization options and The Roku Channel is AMAZING.

I ordered this product twice. The first version worked well until I had to change my internet. It was never able to locate the new network. It wasn't an issue with location or TV - the same TV had a 1st generation Apple TV connected that works. I ordered a replacement, but still no luck. I'm sure this is a one-off, but it is frustrating.
It's way better than the apps that come on the visio TV. The roku needs rebooted often but otherwise it is great.
Fácil instalación, conectividad a internet veloz, muy bien pensado los componentes y accesorios

The Roku express is exactly what I imagined. I had a fire-stick before, and I definitely like the Roku better. My family has a TV provider that I can link to for the different channels, so this is great for my wants and needs.
This is my fourth Roku and I have never had a problem with any of them. I keep giving them away and getting newer models. Super easy, reliable, and affordable.
Loved this.  It was one of the easiest set ups that I have ever done.  Love all the options of channels that can be added.
We did our research before ordering to ensure we were getting the proper Roku for our TV. I am extremely satisfied. We upgraded from a Sony blue ray and I'm very happy and the price is great!
Easy to install. I am using an antenna for my local channels and Roku for my " cable". Saving a lot of money cutting the cable cord.
Love the ease of set up and functionality. You can download apps and customize the home screenThe remote doesn't sync with your tv so you can't control the volume or power
Purchased this so the wife could movies I can get on the computer for free. I don't have a smart tv so this was the answer. Easy to install and setup. Pleased with my purchase.
I love my Roku so much! Easy to use and the app selection is good! I have purchased one for multiple family members for Christmas
The wifi range is horrible on this unit. It's always buffering.  I dont have this issue with my Amazon Fire TV.
This is the 2nd one I purchased
I ordered 2. Both appeared to have been opened and taped poorly. One the controller came all smashed so I pretty sure it's not usable. Going to see if the other one works later.
Was a birthday gift for my son. He hasn't complained, so I know it has been an easy set up for him. He really is happy with it.
We have all the major streaming devices right now, and of them, this is the easiest UX. Worth the $.
Works great able to watch everything only thing I don’t like is the remote don’t have a volume button like the old ones
Can’t control volume. Works fine but remote doesn’t always pick up on sensor. Primitive looking interface. Should have gotten a fire stick instead.

I would unplug it plug it back in hit the reset button and it still would not work. I have two of my house I got them 30 days apart and the other one works perfectly fine still but I'm sure one day it'll stop working too.
Hated using it. Fire stick was easier and less problematic. And now Roku is getting rid of the Fox channels??? I returned it and got a Fire stick
I got this for my kids school room so that they can watch documentaries on netflix and Youtube. I have a "dumb" TV, so this was a great affordable upgrade rather than buying a NEW smart TV.
Nice box to watch tv and save some money beware of activation  fee when you set up, nice picture quality
I  was very impressed with the quality  and how easy it was to set it up.thank you
Very easy to use. Only bought it because my TV is a smart TV just does not have Roku & I cant use Disney+. Now I can!
Didn’t know I needed this in my life. No more HDMI cord, the Roku makes watching tv simpler, all just a click away. Very happy to have this in my life now.
Thoroughly enjoy the Roku interface. It’s easy enough for my parents to use when they come over, and has enough options to keep me busy.
I’m very happy with this, the picture quality is the best I’ve gotten from my previous devices and it was easy to set up!

took more time to take register online than  taking it out of box and  hooking it up. It was ready to go in just a few minutes.
Reliable, easy to use and instructions on screen were simple and straightforward. Have had no problems with two I have in my home.
Discontinued Netflix and got this! Quite a gem - lots of free channels and now we have Pureflix!!!
Facil de instalar y de usar, compacto y muy util, se recomienda su compra para el entretimiento.
I love this Roku because it works so good no interruption no blackouts it works very well I would recommend this to anybody

Our Roku was very easy to set up. It is very easy to navigate and set up channels. The Roku has access to major streaming services. The Roku will save us considerable money monthly when we discontinue our satellite tv subscription.The only issue we have is occasional buffering. The buffering lasts only a few seconds. This is most likely due to our WiFi connection. Our Roku is a great investment. The days of cable and satellite tv are over.
Great entry to the streaming world. A lot of free content available on almost unlimited providers.

We love it! Got rid of cable for this and have no regrets. The only two things I wish it had is volume control and voice command. I do think there is an upgraded on one that has those on them, but we  are happy with this one!
